name: Layla: The Iris Missions
description: Layla: The Iris Missions is a complete overhaul of the Famicom game Layla. It features all-new levels, altered graphics, an original and much-expanded soundtrack, and many tweaks to game mechanics, with the goal of creating a more modern game experience without compromising the core grabbing-cake-and-ice-cream-on-roller-skates gameplay.

name: Pixel Wars
description:
Test your strategy skills in an intense real-time battle with friends. With just enough units and buildings to keep it exciting, you can jump into an online multiplayer game the moment that perfect Steam invite arrives!

Get ready to enjoy the simplicity! With only five building types and six unit types, you don’t have to worry about feeling bogged down—now it's time for some fun.

Discover an uncharted world with each map you generate! Unlock new levels of excitement as you journey through unpredictable landscapes and ever-changing challenges.

With just one click, you can challenge your Steam friends to a thrilling online match! Have fun and prove yourself the ultimate gaming champion.

Now you can make quick work of commanding your troops with our intuitive control system. Select and group units without the hassle, so that military tactics come to life right before your eyes!

Step back in time and explore the world of pixel art. With our retro graphics, you can experience a classic aesthetic while still staying clear and readable - it's fantastical fun!

name: Mystery Legends: Phantom of the Opera - Collector’s Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Pokémon Trading Card Game: Neo
description:
This hack, Pokémon TCG Neo, is a nearly complete overhaul of the base game in terms of battling. Why? Because all the generation 1 cards in this game have been replaced with generation 2 cards, everything has been balanced.

Featuring your favorites from Neo Genesis all the way to Skyridge, so many cards have been added and replaced that it’s completely changed the way this game is played. Pokémon, attacks, abilities, and even a few trainer cards were altered to create a new battling experience. If you’re looking for a TCG hack with all-new pokémon cards, look no further!

name: Tchia: Oléti Edition
description: The Tchia: Oléti Edition comes with the Tchia base game and the Kepler Customization Pack, which includes four costume sets for Tchia and four boat customization packs, inspired by fellow titles from the Kepler game catalogue.

name: Orb Devils
description: A short experimental deck building roguelike! Use Attack Cards on enemy intentions to weaken their attacks, Use Heal Cards on status effects to increase their effects! Play as Demon bounty hunters looking for their Target as you combine and use Card orbs.

name: Meowter Space
description: Meowter Space is the quintessential space cat experience. Explore, build and battle your way through space with your fellow feline friends - facing danger of catastrophic purr-portions.

name: Gen 2.1. No Escape
description: Delve into a VHS-style single player FPS experience blending survival horror and classic horror. Battle against Shaggoths and Necrozombies as you collect resources and fight to survive, all while uncovering the terrifying secrets of H.P. Lovecraft's "In the Mountains of Madness".

name: Kyofu Hyakumonogatari
description: Sin descripción

name: Akai Sumo: Ai no Dosukoi Densetsu
description: Sin descripción

name: Kill It With Fire VR
description: The spider: Usually hairy, often poisonous and ALWAYS up to something. Take your arachnophobia to new heights in Kill it With Fire VR, and deal with spiders by any means necessary!

name: NomNomNom!
description:
This is Pug #1 and he is really hungry! The only way to make him happy is to feed him as fast as you can. Do it properly and as Grandma pug says: “Chomp to nom if you want to be a good bloke, otherwise bad things will happen and you’re going to choke!”.
Fist endless game by the Squarefrog Games gang. Endless and delicious! Beat your own score and save the pug from starvation.

name: Starlit On Wheels: Super Kart
description:
Welcome to the ride of your life with the heroes from Starlit Adventures: Bo and Kikki!
Help Bo and Kikki on a thrilling chase to recover the stars that the villain Nuru has stolen to power his magical motor.

name: Rock the Goat
description:
Meet Barry, the goat who was born to balance!
Rock your way from the depths of the jungle, to a cyber-city, through space (not time), dressed as characters like Scubarry, Barry-Bot 3000, Private Barry & many more! Help him tiptoe, hop and slide as he collects coins to unlock his alter egos and their exotic locations.
How long can you Rock The Goat?

name: None Tank Age
description:
Can you image a tomato is running to you someday?
Join in on the fun and create the best weapon ever!

name: Village and Farm
description:
Love farming in the Middle Ages?
Immerse yourself into the best Middle Ages farming game on mobile! Explore the unique way of farming in the old world.

name: Strike Pose
description: Cooperative jump-posing for 1 to 10 players.

name: Cave Ranger
description: When the Bitty Gang steals the town's livelihood and takes it underground, a lone, brave cowboy must come to the rescue. Cave Ranger is an 8-bit inspired, retro platform game. Rescue sheep, fight outlaws, and face down dangerous critters. With a whip and pistol at his disposal, the cave ranger must traverse old mines, water reservoirs, and even a saw mill! It is a lighthearted, laid back western, full of platformer fun.

name: Random Dice: Go
description:
Random Dice: Go is a real-time, auto-battle strategy game where every choice matters.
Claim victory by countering the opponent's strategy and placing the right Dice in the right place.
Always think strategically about your next move.

name: Cats Fighters
description: Cats Fighters is an epic game of free fight girls fighting in bikinis in the best beaches in the world, playing the world of women's wrestling or if you prefer can depute in his quick fight mode, ye dispute a fight training, fight against 12 amazing girls and feel the power in your fists, performs amazing special attacks, improve your fighter and skills.

name: Snack Time for Caterpillar
description:
It's Snack Time! Help Caterpillar eat as much fruit as possible!
As you progress, the seasons pass and those pesky dragonflies come to bother poor Caterpillar! Tilt your iPhone/iPod Touch to dodge the dragonflies, then engage monster mode to turn into a dragonfly eating machine! But be careful, Caterpillar's energy will run out, so you'll need to keep eating fruit to charge up!

name: A Frantic Santa Situation
description:
Have you ever procrastinated? Well Santa has, and now he needs your help! It’s Christmas eve, Santa’s elves have all gone on strike and he’s depending on you to help him get all the presents out for Christmas!
Race the clock and go for the high score in this insanely addictive action packed arcade game. Push as many gift boxes out the door before your reindeer take off without you! Don’t forget to choose your presents wisely. Each comes with different rewards.

name: Gravity Mike
description: Gravity Mike is an adventure game in which you are locked in a maze. You have to find the magical object to unlock the exit and then to find your way out...

name: Karate Do
description: The epic Karate Do world awaits you. Step into the place where only the chosen ones fight. Gather the wisdom of Sensei through great challenges along, master your skills and become a legend of martial arts. Are you sure you have trained enough?

name: Slash Them All
description:
Decapitate zombies and play basketball with their heads to score as many points as possible!
More than twenty characters are to unlock!
Grab your sword and go!

name: FoxTrotte
description:
FoxTrotte makes you play Mr. Fox chasing Mr. Crow, the stealer of his beloved cheese!
He sees his soulmate fly away in the evil talons of his nemesis!
Be quick, help him get his precious wheel of cheese back!

name: Fight Arena Online
description: This game will make you a real fighter! Gather your friends, choose your character and upgrade their equipment and special attacks. Prove to everyone in the world that you are the best fighter. Online fights with other fighters, unique attacks for every character, combos, jumps and rolls, fireballs, frost spells and lightning. Complete the Challenges mode where you have to show your skills.

name: Infinity Toss
description:
"Infinity Toss" is a game you can enjoy using only one finger.
It's easy and fun. It's never difficult to play.
Just shoot the ball at the basket.
Check the wind direction before the shooting.
Get more coins to purchase new balls.

name: Jump Lover
description: Welcome to "Jump Lover" game! Click on the phone screen! ready go ! Stack Jump To Dear girl ! Very simple and fun game. More levels and world wait for you to adventure!

name: Cowhop
description: Cowhop is the most awaited game from cowbelly studios! A 2D action platformer where you defeat enemies, collect powerups and reach space while vibing!

name: SnowBall Champions
description: Enjoy winter on your device.Become a SnowBall Champion and Throw snow,slide,hold,evade and drag on the snow in hilltop.Knock out the players with a snowball and gain knock out points to unlock other snowball champions.

name: Safari: I-Evolution
description:
Safari: Evolution has High quality graphics and gameplay, hunt by foot, 4x4 Jeep, Motorbike, Boat or Horse - your faithful friend - Whistle to Call.
Explore this open world full of deadly wild animals and watch out for the carnivores:
Rhino, Elephant, Lion, Zebra, Giraffe, Lioness, Reedbuck, Buffalo, Wildebeest, Flamingo, Lemur, Bee's, Crocodile, Piranha, WartHog, Monkey, Ostrich, Meerkat, Snake, Scarabs, Hyena, Hippopotamus, Leopard, Impala, Eagle and Gorilla.

name: Climb Fling
description:
A fun physics climbing game all about flinging!
50 levels, customizable characters, puzzles.

name: B.C. Piezophile
description: B.C. Piezophile is a first-person action horror game set deep underwater. It features a foreign ocean brimming with ambivalent environments, hazardous anomalies and baroque ecosystems. Stranded in the hadal zone, the player must ascend over 6,150 AeC before they can dream of rescue.

name: Onenellemoo
description: This is an action-adventure game that requires you to use your brain. Save the world with your powers of observation and inspiration!

name: Never Forgotten
description: A uniquely stylised survival-horror adventure game. Explore a dying world, navigating through hazards and solving puzzles by deciphering riddles and combining items.

name: Gemstone Guardians
description: Gemstone Guardians is a tower defense game where selection and combinations are key. Similar to a game of poker, players are given a set of random towers each round and must make the best combinations to prevent the waves of enemies from reaching the end.

name: Smeesa Street
description: Smeesa Street is a branching visual novel and an interesting way to spend time for those who enjoy atmospheric horror stories. Message us and you'll forget about your troubles. You'll be drowning in happiness. This is your path to endless joy.

name: TerraScape
description: Build gorgeous kingdoms on floating islands by strategically placing buildings in this cozy City-Puzzler. Discover secret combinations, take on weekly challenges and explore randomly generated maps in various single- and multiplayer game modes.

name: Elven Rivers: The Forgotten Lands - Collector's Edition
description: Celene and her brave teammates have already earn a reputation for themselves: this is why they were chosen to be the first group to explore the neighbouring continent of beastmen.

name: Roots of Rebirth
description: At the heart of an underground world, take control of a Slider to help ISA deploy her roots to reconnect with her past and escape from the planet where she is trapped.

name: Squirrel and Nuts
description: The squirrel is about to go for the winter. To do this, she needs to find a new home and collect the required number of nuts. Help the squirrels with this. You are going on a big trip.

name: Saccharine Pale
description: Saccharine Pale is a "Slash 'n Parry Nemesis Feud" with a DEEPLY robust, intuitive, and revolutionary combat system! Launch your rival, the Stiltfox, into the air with a well timed parry to juggle it with attacks, or slam it into a solid surface and see what happens!

name: AGIS
description: AGIS - A Game In Space is a top-down twin-stick-shooter.

name: Torpedo Boat
description: Take control of one of the most dangerous American ships during World War II and become a capitan of the elite crew of torpedo boats. Patrol sea, explore places and destroy enemy naval units. Become a real captain and make history!

name: Enemies: Gone Suburban
description: Tired of the story? The plot? The looming twists? Take a break and shoot the shit and not in a conversational manner! Like literally, shoot shit!!! Well not actual shit but like, shoot things. Shoot....Enemies!

name: Etherion Online
description: Gear up! Become a prestige master in weapons or master a skill - join thousands of other players in this massive 2D adventure!

name: Starstruck
description: Navigate the world of show business as a talent agent, helping your clients become stars, and maybe even fall in love. With unique party card 'battles', deckbuilding, and narrative choice, 'Starstruck' offers a blend of strategy and romance for a relaxed but intelligent gaming experience.

name: The Obscura Experiment
description: Anabasis & Co. welcomes you to the family - we’re so glad to have you here! Your mandate as part of this research project will be to monitor and document a new energy form: the [Redacted]. To begin, let’s review your perso- oh? We’re detecting some anomalies near you… care to investigate?

name: Jetpac Too
description: A free frantic and fast paced reimagining of the classic Jetpac with All Vs All or Team Match with unique real-time terraforming played over the surface of a planetoid.

name: Lovelorn Sanatorium Ⅲ
description: This is a spoof plot puzzle game. Click the dialogue to advance the plot. There are many puzzle-solving levels in the game. You can find props by exploring and solve puzzles according to the game prompts

name: Digital Eclipse Arcade: Q.P.I.D.
description: Rescue cats! Collect hearts! Defy the laws of physics! Q.P.I.D. is part platformer, part physics puzzler, part race against the clock. Did we mention the cats?

name: Sweet Science: The Girls of Silversee Castle
description: A visual novel that takes you back in time – to a chapter of your youth, long forgotten – to four quirky young women – to a castle full of science, mysteries and – perhaps – romance...This is the first large AI-generated VN.

name: SlavicPunk: Oldtimer
description: The game is an isometric shooter. The story revolves around Yanus- a private investigator with a troubled past trying to solve the case of stolen data while fighting his inner demons, urban gangs and an omnipotent corporation responsible for the decay of the city he once used to call his own.

name: Railway Company Owner
description: Railroad Tycoon is a puzzle train simulator video game. build a railway city bigger and more complex than anyone could ever imagine. Build your city into the biggest railroad city in the world.

name: Finding Fern
description: Finding Fern is an Action Adventure RPG with an emphasis on story and dialog. Your party members will talk to each other as well as many people and denizens they meet along the way.

name: Bow Climb
description: Join players from around the world in a gauntlet of challenges you and your bow must overcome. Bow climb is a social climbing game. It'll take time but you'll be able to do it!

name: Loya
description: Loya is an open world, multiplayer RPG with dynamic combat, crafting and a procedurally generated world! Play alone or with your friends with private servers!

name: El Panadero: The Baker
description: Action Packed 2D Arcade Action Platformer featuring hand-drawn graphics. Armed with your fists (or a rolling pin) and a variety of bread-based boosts, fend of the the Alien Plants, and avenge the Bakery they destroyed.

name: Aleon's Nightmare 2
description: Welcome to the World of Nightmares! You play as Aleon, you woke up in an unfamiliar place. You need to understand what is going on and get help from the surrounding objects. The nightmare world includes different parts. Castle, Kingdom, Forest, and Dungeon.

name: Grey Haven
description: Grey Haven is a game where you explore Nightmare and build a village with the girls you saved. Explore the Nightmare with the help of the witch, help the girls and gather resources to build your haven.

name: Attack on Hex Island
description: A cute and approachable turn-based deck builder/card battler that combines the battle systems from Tetra Master/Triple Triad and Pokémon. Collect, upgrade, and customize your party to strategically defeat your opponents and save them from the attack on Hex Island.

name: Ancient Arrow
description: Action Bow Shooting in this squad-based VR Battle Royale

name: Phase Line: Raider Assault
description: Phase Line: Raider Assault allows players to jump into high adrenaline combat arenas in various fictitious environments around the world. Partake in tactical battles in third-person perspective to battle with other online combatants for victory.

name: Angrbotha Mountains
description: Angrbotha mountains is a short cinematic, story driven adventure RPG game. Regard it as a short solo RPG session with a game master. Levelling up, meet wandering creatures, putting the story together, making choices, exploring and finding items are important parts to put the events to rest.

name: Hearth's Light: Potion Shop
description: A cozy, casual potion-making and shop-managing game, that is complimented by an array of deep mechanics to keep crafting potions satisfying and interesting regardless of how many times you've done it.

name: Subtension
description: Outfit, crew and command your submarine to save what's left of humanity beneath the seas of a ruined earth. Man your sub's systems and take aim in this real-time strategy epic! Inspired by FTL, this subnautic student project serves as our first 2-semester release.

name: You Are Sick
description: Do you like feeling sick? Well, this is the perfect game for you! Feel the thrill of testing your parkour skills as you overcome simulated sickness. Are you ready for the challenge?

name: Captain Meow
description: FPS RPG Action Adventure

name: The Devilry Reservation
description: A faceless PSS agent visits a "reservation" due to complaints from its residents. Deal with the problems of evil spirits and reveal their mysteries and secrets. Explore a world once hidden from people. Get to know the mythological stars and their life stories.

name: Virtual Families 3
description: The sequel to the smash hit mobile game “Virtual Families 2” is here!

name: Punt
description: In Punt, gravity is at your fingertips -- discover the abilities of the E.M.M.A. in this new and innovative first-person puzzle platformer running on the Source Engine!

name: Death Race Outer Space
description: Fast paced 3d multi-player/single-player shooter which can be played both in online as well as split-screen modes. Players race against each other through the trenches of space in a gameplay style which rewards spontaneity, shooting and athleticism in a dynamic and complex environment.

name: No Way Out
description: Escape the monotony of your daily routine and discover a path beyond this seemingly endless cycle. Embrace the thrill of the unknown, as you embark on a journey to break free from the ordinary. Will you be brave enough to take the leap, even if there seems to be No Way Out?

name: Kaikyuu no Eshi
description: Sin descripción

name: Betray Me Not
description: Control your feline friend to cooperate by playing mini-games and avoiding being turned into gold by other greedy cats.

name: Water 2050
description: Take on the ultimate challenge of being mayor of the last city with clean water reserves in 2050. Manage resources, discover new technologies and tackle the global water crisis with Water 2050. An innovative blend of city building, resource management, adventure, and survival genres all in one game.

name: Mauled
description: Mauled is a first-person survival horror game where players are stuck in an endless loop of death trying to escape a horrific late-night shopper...

name: AInder
description: What is AI? What is love? In Ainder, you will be able to swipe “Like” or “Nope” on characters created by AI. They sometimes send photos that might excite you. Through communicating with the characters, the human and the AI will learn and adapt.

name: Bombo Rumble
description: Bombo Rumble is a 4 player local - multiplayer game where you throw bombs with physics at your foes. Battle in 12 different arenas, use a variety of weapons and power ups to blast away your friends or play against Bots

name: Bloody Horror Plant
description: Bloody Horror Plant – probably the bloodiest casual point and click adventure game ever! Help Horror Plant solve interesting and funny point and click puzzles, kill evil dwarfs, save the forest and its creatures!

name: Kazak
description: In this retro inspired turn-based RPG, customize your battle skills, test your reflexes and blast your way through hostile environments. With multiple level routes, story paths, endings and more, no two playthroughs will be alike.

name: Reflexia: The Archetype's Room of Three Walls
description: The story in this game that's missing the fourth wall and the roof starts from pantsu jokes and ends with your depression. Play at your own risk!

name: Mr. Hopp's Playhouse 3
description: Two young girls must solve puzzles, avoid traps and overcome hellish enemies to find The Six Medalions and put an end to The Entity's reign, once and for all.

name: Before Resignation
description: It is a game in which the main character, who suffered from stress after being unfairly treated at the company, takes revenge the day before leaving the company.

name: Dystopian Debugger
description: Dystopian Debugger is a puzzle game about debugging murderous robots.

name: Xheres
description: Either FPS or TPS, choose your play style and survive the apocalypse on your own or with your friends. But one must know for sure it ain't gonna be easy, there are hordes waiting for you. Not even considering tough ones... Nevertheless it's gonna be a fun experience.

name: Dark Age Empires
description: Dark Age Empires is an open world survival game that can be played in single player mode or as an online multiplayer game on a dedicated server.Do you have what it takes to not only survive in this dark age, but to rise up, fight back and create your own Dark Age Empire?

name: Dragons Heart
description: You've been given the power to peer into people's inner hearts. It's now up to you to empathize and understand each person by helping them with their trauma. Saving the world one relationship at a time! Beware there are some who only seek misery it'll be up to you to determine their fate.

name: Lokaa
description: A first-person adventure game about Lyra, a woman who travels to a fabled tower in hopes of fulfilling a wish.

name: Lorena and the Land of Ruins
description: Lorena and the Land of Ruins is a third-person 3D platform shooter in which you explore a beautiful fantasy world filled with many mysteries and ruins of the past!

name: Potio Mellow
description: Experience endless adventure in "Potio Mellow," a single-player card game. Explore, gather, craft and battle your way through a mysterious world with a radiant art style. Build your deck, overcome obstacles and discover endless possibilities.

name: Milo no Senki 3
description: In this new entry to the turn-based tactical-RPG Milo no Senki serie, Lord Milo and his group of companions will travel to the realm of the dead in order to bring back their departed friend, Prince Nelson...

name: Low Oxygen
description: A short linear puzzle platformer about an astronaut on an alien planet. Explore this strange facility by solving strange puzzles which include but not limited to pushing plants, throwing plants, growing plants, bouncing plants and last but not least bouncing plants on other plants.

name: Misaligned
description: Classic 80s inspired shooter

name: Deliverance & Reign
description: Join a gothic battle where Good confronts Evil using roguelike deckbuilding mechanics. Play as either side, invading Alaric's Castle, or as Alaric himself defending against the invading heroes!

name: The Battle of Sacred Heart
description: The Battle of Sacred Heart is a refreshing action RPG. Sacred Heart nuns challenge the elite of the four armies of Middle Earth. What the player must face is a protracted battle to the death.

name: MF-01 Aerostrike
description: A Tactical Shmuplovania. Aerostrike combines elements from Metroidvania, Bullet Hell, and Shmup genres. Take flight in the MF-01 Aerostrike, explore a large underground base, battle against squadrons of hostile ships of all shapes and sizes, and find a way to escape alive.

name: Deep Death Dungeon Darkness
description: Challenge yourself again and again to meet your dead lover in dark fantasy roguelike action The structure of the Labyrinth of Death, which leads to the underworld, changes every time you play Abundant weapons, heavy action and heavy-handed combat through magic

name: My Friend, the Catgirl
description: A dating sim with catgirls. Check out the hot pics of your girl friend!

name: Riley in the Abyss
description: Riley In The Abyss is a stealth action shooter. You wake up as 'Riley'in an underwater facility to research the depths of the ocean. Upon waking up, something is wrong... Everyone is seemingly dead. Sink or swim in this short psychological horror game.

name: Space Pop: Bubble Shooter
description: "Blast off into the galaxy with our new bubble shooter game! Explore 200 levels set across stunning intergalactic environments and pop your way to victory. With intuitive controls and addictive gameplay, you'll enjoy hours of bubble-blasting fun.

name: Super Crane Bug
description: Retro match 3 with a Bug juggling at his job. Line tiles in a line to destroy them, but the way to move them changes constantly. Be a Bug, Do a Work, Match a 3

name: Paddle Flap
description: Ready, set, FLAP! Flex your paddle flapping skills in this casual but engaging arcade game. Imagine pinball, but remove all distractions and just focus on the ball action. Use the paddle to strike the falling balls and make them hit the right targets to earn points, power-ups and achievements!

name: Sharks
description:
You are the Apex Predator.
Swim, bite and attack in VR using a unique locomotion method that only needs the movement of your head and one controller: look where you want to go, pull the trigger to swim, squeeze the grip button to bite. You won't believe how fluid and dynamic the shark motion is.
Hunt with groups of up to 10 people online. Eat whatever you can to survive and avoid the zombie sharks: last player standing wins.
Escape from other sharks, or outmaneuver the survivors to catch them. Use powerups, hide in caves and shipwrecks, and use cannonballs and mines to evade and chase sharks down.

name: Survivor Mercs
description: Lead your squad of Mercs against M.E.G.A. Corp.'s evil robot army. Fast-paced twin-stick action, frantic horde survival, tactical squad-building & lots of loot! Exploit game-breaking synergies and beat the evil billionaire bosses in ever-changing operations. Lock, load, and loot, Commander!

name: World of Mana
description: You can play with many people with a map made with the map editor and share the created map. You can set up individual or team battles and become a team together to catch monsters, escape mazes, or fight each other. Create a map using the map editor in World of Mana and enjoy it together.

name: Night Stones
description: You awake in Mythica, a cozy island where magical stones change day to night. Explore winding paths or venture into the wilds with your trusty glider and sailboat. To return home, you must befriend quirky townsfolk, discover hidden treasures, master magic, and face enemies in clever puzzle combat.

name: Desperate Survival
description: Fight against Hordes of Zombies, Skeletons and other creatures to survive as long as possible. Upgrade your arsenal and rescue other Survivors on your DESPERATE SURVIVAL.

name: Sahara Storms WWIII
description: Sahara Storms WWIII is a multiplayer tactical First Person Shooter based on modern current environment. Offering objective gameplay where every player plays their part to win. Whether if you are a Assault, a Support, a Medic or Recon Class each role is important.

name: Game Collecting Simulator
description: In "Game Collecting Simulator", play as the new collector in town, Thomas. Interact with other game enthusiasts and hunt for the games you want. This is a short visual novel featuring casual gameplay.

name: Erophone:Re
description: Erophone is returned and renewed from its original. The conflict between humans and ajin girls continues to escalate in the NORMAL city, the organizations behind the scenes are eager to move. The choice is in your hands whether to help the girls or to hunt them down.

name: Dreamwalker
description: A visual novel about a man who discovers the existence of another dimension hidden in dreams. Explore and learn the rules of a new reality, meet fellow dreamwalkers and solve the mystery of a disaster in the past. Make decisions, build relationships and strive to reach the best ending!

name: The Abyss
description: The Abyss is a 2D puzzle about descent, in order to pass the levels you need to score a certain number of points and choose the right ways to pass the level.

name: Water Tank
description: A year had almost passed since my wife disappeared. It has been raining in a cloudy sky. Every day the phone rings with calls from his wife's mother inquiring about her whereabouts. Various rumors have begun to circulate in the neighborhood about his wife's sudden disappearance.

name: Pinewood Valley
description: Pinewood Valley is a Single Player, First-Person Open World Horror. Set in 2006, you play a young male who returns to his hometown and finds the whole town has vanished or being killed by a group of unknown killers. You must Run, Hide or Fight to uncover what happened in Town of Pinewood Valley.

name: MoonScavenger
description: The main character also dreams of becoming a billionaire, leaving behind a gloomy future that seems to be just an ordinary life on Earth, investing all the money he had in moon tickets and a moon cleaning company, and embarking on a long journey penniless.

name: Battle Cry of Freedom: Blood & Gore
description: Experience the brutal and gruesome reality of the 19th Century with the Blood & Gore DLC for Battle Cry of Freedom. With the Blood & Gore DLC you can expect to see new and improved death and wounded animations including decapitations, dismemberment and more.

name: HiveCorp
description: Join the HiveCorp mercenaries in their fight against an onslaught of enemies in this action rogue-lite auto-shooter. Avoid enemies, level up and combine powerful weapons and equipment to survive.

name: Chronicles of Time: Timeline Zero
description: Travel back in time and unravel the mystery of humanity's extinction in Chronicles of Time: Timeline Zero. Play as Azura, a skilled warrior with time-manipulation abilities, and defeat the rogue AI, Crimson, in an epic battle for the fate of humanity.

name: Fishjong 2
description: Fishjong is back with more colorful mahjong levels! Now play Fishjong 2! The goal is simple – clear the board by making matches. Various colors and shapes of tiles, new set and background. No storyline - just a great mahjong gameplay. Have fun playing ocean-theme levels.

name: Midnight Arrow
description: Hop on platforms and jump on walls to explore a vast immersive world. Discover different types of arrows and use them to solve puzzles and traverse this dimly lighted world.

name: New Year Break
description: New Year Break is retro arcade game with animated characters, powerups and custom music. Collect bonuses and powerups and blast your way thru the 30 Levels into the New Year. Simple controls and retro arcade action. Collect all the powerups to stack powerups.

name: Glimmer Chain
description: Glimmer Chain is a skill-based platformer in which you are an energized robot with a hook and a chain. Swing and light up the city in the shortest time possible!

name: Walk and Stroll
description: Take a brief stroll in the beautiful walking-sim, adventure game: Walk and Stroll! See the sights, find items, and interact with things around town to make the impassable passable.

name: Cats Hidden in Italy
description: Find and discover 100 cute cats hidden across Italy in this hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: Fortress VR
description: FORTRESS IS BACK WITH VR! is multiplayer artillery shooting VR game. Choose unique tank characters and face other players in thrilling PvP strategy and action! The realistic battle scene in front of you awaits!

name: Polar Penguin
description: Help the lost penguin find his way home to his family. Magnetize your way through obstacles along the journey and avoid possible dangers on your path. This game is a short physics based platformer using magnets to traverse yourself and your surroundings.

name: Radical Road
description: A casual, arcade, one button game about getting a car to go as far as it can on an infinitely procedually generated road, while collecting coins.

name: Stagehand Survival Simulator
description: Simulator style game that takes you behind the scenes of the entertainment concert industry.

name: Psycho Fear
description: Psycho Fear is a heart-pounding co-op survival-horror experience where players must escape to survive. Solve challenging puzzles, overcome deadly obstacles, and fight deadly enemies in an intense atmosphere, nerve-wracking and dark environment will keep players on edge.

name: CtrlC
description: CtrlC is an arcade game with the look of the 80s and the technology of today. You have to reach your goal, level by level. The coders among you know: Ctrl+C cancels a running program in the terminal. You might need that info sometime.

name: Super Sean 007
description: Super Sean 007 is a platform game with a great world. The world consists of various beautiful sceneries of nature: forests, caves, mountains, and abandoned ruins telling the stories of when there used to be a civilization there.

name: Forbidden Dojo
description: Embark on an erotic journey where the line between fantasy and reality is blurred. In this sensual visual novel, you are caught between two beautiful and deadly warriors, each with their own unique allure. With each choice you make, the story will unfold, revealing a tale of passion and intrigue.

name: Let's Play Jigsaw Puzzles: At the Zoo
description: Assemble images of your favorite creatures, including lions, elephants, giraffes, monkeys and more. Get ready for a challenging and enjoyable experience!

name: Kiting Mechanics
description: Kiting Mechanics is a training game for MOBAs. Sharpen your kiting skills and develop strong muscle memory by dodging famous MOBA spells recreated with 1-to-1 speed, timing and hitbox.

name: Massive Defense
description: A Science-Fantasy tower defense game. Challenging bosses are waiting for you. If you lose a tower you also lose ring and place for a tower. Strategize your way to victory with the ultimate tower and placement composition.

name: CardShark
description: CardShark is a roguelike card-battler game in which you take the role of a young daring shark, seeking adventure. Battle your way through each floor of a dangerous dungeon in an endeavour to reach the bottom...

name: Walk the Past VR
description: Walk The Past VR is a narrated journey through history. Explore the fortifications and environments of the battle of Cartagena in 1741. Listen to an enthralling voice acted retelling of the events. Find objects around the locations, read beautifully written journals and discover all the landmarks.

name: Tales of Mathasia
description: The lands of Mathasia are beginning to be covered in Corruption. An old legend about the Hero that will master the arts of mathematicians and use his power to defeat the Sorcerer. Only this mysterious Hero can fight the Corruption and stop incoming Darkness!

name: Holy Ocean
description: Ride your bike through the ocean of meat, alone or with friends. Raiders on your tail. They built a tower on that head island. Sneak in. Take down their leader. Destroy the whole island if needed. It is all for the love of Rose

name: Thief of Smiles
description: Thief of Smiles is a 2D physics puzzle game with stealth elements. Move lamps, fling barrels, tie up enemies and swing through levels. But be sure to stay hidden in the shadows. All you need for this is your chewing gum companion Ponti. Uncover the dark secrets of the Smiles Savings Bank!

name: Cream War
description: This is a physics party game, where you can cooperate with your friends to complete missions (interactive damage) in a cute piece of gameplay. There is more player UGC content waiting for the player to build.

name: Tales of the Magic Ball
description: Tales of the Magic Ball is a mix of puzzle game, adventure, roller ball and plattformer. Enter a fantasy world, explore, puzzle, experience a story, fight and overcome obstacles with a physically simulated ball.

name: Rogue Realms
description: Rogue Realms is an empire building game in which you place tiles to expand the world and build on those tiles to gather the resources you need. Rogue Realms features full 3D pixel world to explore from any angle. Explore new biomes and buildings to grow an empire to stand the test of time.

name: Hentai Cheerleader
description: What could be more beautiful than hentai?

name: HeroVersus
description: HeroVersus is a PVP esport grade online fighting game with rollback netcode. The game inherits the fighting game trandition from the arcade era, with 2 joystick control & no F2P upgrades. Its a ture fair fight between player skills & wits!

name: Noah Please!
description: Dash and whack your way through waves of animals that want a piece of that ark. There's only room for two of each!

name: Residuum
description: Defend your base on Mars from invaders in Residuum. A thrilling mix of tower defense and shooter gameplay, upgrade weapons and choose your crew for a unique experience each time. Play with a friend for even more excitement!

name: Riding Horse School
description: It's time to make new friends!

name: Fling D'Block
description: A physics based precision time-trial/speedrun game

name: Dark Rune
description: Dark rune - A story about a bounty hunter who decided to serve the local sheriff. The area is full of dangers, and you will have to deal with them alone. Find the dark rune stolen from the local vault!

name: Mafia in Town
description: A crime that is not proven is not a crime!

name: Geko: Entering The Pipe
description: Geko: entering the pipe is a casual, fast-paced game where you play Geko, an unlucky lizard who ends up in two plumbing pipes while trying to catch a fly. Help Geko dodge all the enemies and obstacles and escape the pipes, so he can finally get back to his hunt.

name: Life in the Twilight
description: Life in the Twilight - this is a world of hopelessness in which the guardians are looking for you to stop your escape.

name: Air Star
description: Throw Planes, Buy Upgrades, and Place Towers to defend against the oncoming waves of luggage! With 50+ unique upgrades to buy, discover new builds run after run. Unlock tons of froggy cosmetics in this Character Tower Defense!

name: Stellar Insurgency
description: Explore a galaxy of 300 systems as you control your fleet in a top-down 3D style, navigating through Star-lanes, Warp gates, and Black holes. Customize and upgrade your fleet, complete missions, hire your crew, wage war and determine the fate of the galaxy in this grand sim saga.

name: Mimic Hunters
description: Mimic Hunters - is a game in which you have to become an mimic or a hunter.An exciting game for a company of friends and new acquaintances.

name: Backrooms: The Project
description: Backrooms: The Project is an immersive first-person found footage horror adventure game. Explore the different levels of this mysterious liminal dimension known as the Backrooms, finding and utilizing items to aid you in your escape. Be careful though...you are not alone.

name: Petit Petit Petit
description: Get ready for an exciting and refreshing adventure! In this thrilling game, you will be in charge of manipulating immune cells and medical nanomachines to fight off invading pathogens and save unknown creatures from deadly diseases.

name: Spellfire Odyssey
description: Spellfire Odyssey is a multiplayer strategy game featuring PVP battles using spell casting. With a unique spell-making mechanic, adding strategy and creativity to gameplay. It offers fast-paced battles with various spell combinations for players of all skill levels.

name: Let's Play Jigsaw Puzzles: Thailand and Cambodia
description: Immerse yourself in the rich cultural heritage and breathtaking landscapes of Thailand and Cambodia.

name: Zombie Builder Defense 2
description: Defend against hordes of zombies in this fun filled top-down shooter. Build and upgrade a base, unlock powerful guns, and take on challenging bosses with up to 4 players in online co-op. Play minigames to earn bonuses and survive the zombies apocalypse one night at a time!

name: Shadow of Ether
description: Shadow of Ether is a first person horror game where a man with a spiritual power goes deep into the lower astral plane to banish an archon in a secluded haunted house in a forest.

name: Saint Warner's Angels
description: Howdy partner, welcome to Warner's Pass! In this Western turn-based RPG, get ready to fight unseen creatures, high school drama queens, and a shady underground criminal society, accompanied by stunning, hand drawn battle sequences that offer you plenty of choices to approach battles in your own way!

name: Delivery Kore
description: It is an open world adventure game that tells the story of Kore, a girl who lives in Eleusis, a forest in Middle-earth where spirits gather, and Poring, who was born from a Spirit Flower. Become Kore, a forest girl, explore the forest of Eleusis with Poring, and deliver Poring to a new world.

name: Rocket Angels Inc
description: Rocket Angels Inc is a fast-paced arena shooter utilizing a grapple hook focused movement system. Gracefully move around the map and knock your opponents out of the arena using explosive based weapons or perform executions while they are stunned to guarantee victory.

name: Rebirthing
description: Rebirtning - is an exciting sandbox where you can build, break and do whatever you want!

name: Athenian Rhapsody: Thunder Goober's Personality Dungeon
description: Athenian Rhapsody: Thunder Goober's Personality Dungeon is a dangerously goofy RPG with fast paced, unique combat and zany secrets and adventures. Your goal is to build your own rhapsody, the story of you - the player - an experience which cannot be replicated by others.

name: Dog Puzzle
description: Help the two dogs dig out the bones they hid in the dirt..."Dog Puzzle" is a challenging puzzle game that requires you to think carefully without worrying about time limits.

name: Eat Your Fucking Soup
description: A comedy Horror FPS about a soup company releasing a new soup at just 10 cents a can! Unbelievable value! With the economy in crisis, the new Soup offering has millions queuing around the block to fill up on cheap & tasty food. But something doesn't taste right!

name: Operation: Polygon Storm
description: A fastpaced, military tug-of-war game with minimal micromanagement. Choose and deploy from a mix of specialized military units to overwhelm the enemy. Experiment with a huge variety of unit compositions, synergies, abilities, and upgrades to lead your army to victory!

name: Kabuto
description: In this game every move matters, kabuto and a pixel art puzzle game where you control a samurai who seeks revenge in a world where only the strong survive.

name: Frontline Survivors
description: Frontline Survivors is an intense top-down shooter that puts you in the boots of a soldier fighting for survival on the battlefield. With countless enemies coming at you from all sides, you'll need to use all your skills and strategy to stay alive.

name: Blood 'N Bullets
description: Blood 'N Bullets is a top down roguelike shooter where your ammo, health and currency are one and the same. You play as a vampire stuck in a prison and have to shoot your way out while your "friend" helps you with upgrades.

name: Hedge Fund Tycoon
description: Are you ready to climb the ranks of the elite and become the wealthiest hedge fund in the world? In this thrilling new stock market game, you'll trade stocks, bonds, and use corruption to achieve your goals. Don't miss your chance to dominate the world of finance and amass a fortune.

name: To Pixelia
description: Experience the ultimate life simulator in To Pixelia. Create your own story, choose your character's look and design your home. Climb the career ladder, compose songs, cook, fight, drive and take care of your health. Live the life you've always wanted.

name: Fight With Keys
description: A combination of action and rhythm games, players need to move characters while entering corresponding keys.

name: The Segment Twins
description: The Twin Hunters fell into The Segment World... Combat various monsters and bosses, and complete their segmented journey! The Segment Twins is a hack-and-slash game with simple controls and a unique character tag action feature.

name: The Editor
description:
Newspaper Editing Adventure.
"In 1996, a congressman was murdered...The prime suspect is a congressman's aide.
As the suspicious article was published the story begins"
Play the role of editor-in-chief of a newspaper.
You become the editor of a newspaper and write a front-page article every day.

name: Hostile Dreams
description: Play through your gloomiest dreams in this challenging ragdoll platformer! Learn and survive the levels, collect dream shards to unlock extra challenges

name: Retro Life
description: create the life of your dreams, in this classic real time life simulation/rpg game. will you become the success story to make your parents proud? or a hopeless loser? the choice is yours

name: Hail to the Rainbow
description: The story of a lonely young man named Ignat, who survives in the dangerous and gloomy world of post-apocalyptic cyberpunk. You have to face the trials of a new reality and plunge into the secrets of the surrounding chaos.

name: Chronicles of TalDun: The Longing
description: A kinetic novel about two magi learning how to live with the burden they each carry. Explore Tal'Dun—a world of dark magick and primordial beings with unfathomable power. Follow a mysterious phenomenon as it turns the world upside down in a way not even magi would be prepared for.

name: Cosmo's Pizzarama
description: Craft fresh slices to restore order to the galaxy.

name: Crazy Designer
description: A strategy and simulation game about interior design. The player has to make the perfect arrangement of compartment, furniture and decoration to satisfy everyone's different request. 9 topics and more than 1200 items in the game.

name: Pooh Honeytime
description: Winnie the Pooh is no longer the same as before. Now he stalks these woods, and few have been lucky enough to see him and escape with their lives. It will be you, your car and your guts.

name: The Awaited ReCollection
description: A story about fatherly love and family affection. A gift for those children who have lost a father in their lives.

name: Arena Story: Rouge And Princess Knight
description: For various reasons, they come to the gladiatorial arena where they can get their wishes, and they keep fighting! The gladiatorial arena is filled with people of different races, demons, or anything else. If you lose, you lose everything, and if you win at the end, you can get everything.

name: Beat the Humans
description: Beat the Humans is a turn-based tactical RPG where you lead a squad of aliens against human invaders. Gather your squad, fight, collect artifacts and explore the star system map to survive and win.

name: Compass of the Destiny: Istanbul
description: Discover the 17th Century Ottoman Empire, its mysteries and real historical events! Draw the path of your destiny with the guidance of the compass that will open the way of Fîtrat!

name: Ogre Chambers DX
description: Roguelike bullet hell shooter, where you fend off waves of attacking monsters in a constantly transforming arena. You are rewarded with upgrades to your vulnerable spaceship if you survive long enough.

name: Zom: Rise of the Apocalypse
description: Zom: Rise of the Apocalypse is a post-apocalyptic Trading and Collecting Card Game that combines strategic PvP multiplayer battles and an immersive RPG single player story. Build your perfect army with cards and abilities recieved in battle or design new ones in the lab using gene programming.

name: Nandemoya of Flower Street
description: Freely create your own fighting style, find the right target on the busy street and knock it down. As long as you complete the girl's commission, you can get the intimate reward you are eager for.

name: Project Null
description: You wake up in a dark forest and you don't know how you got here and you don't remember anything. But somehow everything changed. You meet strange creatures and no one is very friendly in this alien world. Everything in this place are out to quickly end your little journey.

name: Ningyou Genkai
description: Avoid or defeat dolls that move when you're not looking, take their bodies, and make your way to the 399th dimension. This is a short horror game of fear and strategy, an exploration survival horror.

name: Discounty
description: Discounty is a supermarket management life simulation game. Keep shelves stocked, serve customers, and source local wares in the once-thriving town of Blomkest to revitalize your shop and the community. But be careful. The proud Blomkestians are not looking to be saved by some shopkeeper.

name: Hero World
description: This is Hero World, the new platform and turn-based game by QVIK GAMEZ! The barriers of time and space have been shattered. Creatures from a mystical realm have entered our world. Heroes from across the multiverse have emerged to stop the creatures of darkness.

name: The Legend of Skye
description: We will put ourselves in the shoes of a young druid who will be claimed by her tribe to carry out an important mission. After some events in her town, she will have to leave the safety of the forest behind and go explore a world full of dangers. The fate of her grove will be in her hands.

name: My Fake Goblin Wife
description: You have the opportunity to become the husband of the Goblin Baroness. But what are your chances if this love is a sham?

name: Emplacement
description: Emplacement is a turn-based strategy game. Build up a floating metropolis while destroying your enemies. Place your tiles across the map while strategically building up your army & economy. Come up with strategies similar to chess to become the best!

name: Sushi Warrior: Secret Plan
description: "Sushi Warrior: Secret Plan" is a 2D side-scrolling platformer game. With precise physical simulation, this game will put your skills and patience to the test. But be warned, this game is not for the faint of heart.

name: Hunting Pearl Creek
description: Hunting Pearl Creek is a 2d platform game. You make your way along the creek through 9 challenging levels. There are many obstacles and dangers along the way. The challenge is to survive and hopefully reach the cabin.

name: Dramatic Road: The Origin of Wind
description: A full-fledged simulation RPG set in modern Japan! A variety of characters unique to modern times, such as riders, magicians, and baseball players, have appeared. Command them, nurture them, and use their skills to protect the peace of the school!

name: Minos Station: Escape Room
description: You are trapped in one of minos games, an escape room creator, you have several puzzles to solve, and several clues to follow to solve those puzzles, but each time you go to the next escape room, the puzzles are more complicated.

name: Hentai Casual Swap
description: Enjoy this casual tile swap puzzle with dozens of nice illustrations for you to enjoy and relax. With an open gallery for simply relaxing!

name: Plastic Soul
description: Plastic Soul is a daily life simulation about living with an android. Play as a man who gets an android from you son to help you move on from your deceased wife. Progress through the story by interacting with your android and discover the secret behind your wife's death.

name: Magic Potion Liberators
description: A survivor-style rogue lite action game that gives you a comfortable feeling of being a warrioress. Knock down the onrushing monsters and push forward deep into the enemy territory! There are a wide variety of potions you can create as you Lv up. Create powerful builds & smash the witch's servants!

name: Cats Hidden in Paris
description: Find 100 cats hiding in Paris, France in this cute hand-drawn hidden object game.

name: Scrap Bastion
description: Scrap Bastion is a strategy tower defense game where you manage your city, equipping it to survive the waves of mutant creatures, testing your planning and decision making capacities at every turn. Watch out, as time is crucial to win!

name: The Fabled
description: DARK FANTASY ACTION RPG. Join The Fabled, a league of Warriors, Gods, and Demons who traverse the Abyss in seek of wealth and power. A new dark fantasy experience with brutal combat, dragon riding, and an evolving world with each season.

name: Photon Engineer
description: Master laser manipulation and environmental control in this sci-fi puzzle game. Unleash your creativity and uncover the secrets of mysterious platforms that have suddenly appeared near Jupiter.

name: L/Right Reflection
description: "L/Right Reflection" is an RPG game in which the player fights by reflecting enemy attacks. Choose the appropriate magic for each situation, detect the enemy attacks, and face a variety of enemies.

name: Controller
description: Controller is a light Tower Control simulator. Use a simplified instruction system to manage movements of planes around an Airfield. Dynamic hazards will keep on you your toes and force you to alter your plans on the fly. Do you have what it takes to manage the busiest airports in the world?

name: Crimson Song
description: It was only meant to be another annual visit to his mother's grave, but midway through Diandrir's story was shrouded in darkness. A kinect visual novel about darkness and girls' love.

name: Virtual Chemistry Lab
description: This is a serious game. Made for educational purposes. It was made in order to enable students to understand the high school chemistry curriculum and to provide equality of opportunity.

name: BookyPets Legends
description: BookyPets Legends is a videogame of adventure, exploration and collecting, whose main objective is to encourage children from 7 to 12 years to read in an easy and funny way.

name: Tokyo Neural Groove
description: Tokyo Neural Groove is a pixel art style adventure game, inspired by old school point 'n click games and classic interactive fiction. It is a game inspired by a story that tells a tale of strange characters living in Tokyo in the year 2116.

name: Armoured VR
description: Armoured VR is a Cooperative Multiplayer tank game. Crew up one, or a whole platoon of tanks as a Commander, Gunner or Driver; Alone or with friends and fight through combined arms missions, working with infantry to win one of the most important battles of WW2.

name: Gigantropolis
description: A short metroidvania with a focus on freedom of choice! Gain abilities to get access to other areas! Help fallen friends to summon their spirits to fight along side you! Level up! Upgrade your equipment! Then when you feel ready, go and confront the mighty Gigantimus to stop him destroying the city!

name: Jo Jo Wo
description: Jo Jo Wo is a multiplayer battle game. choose roguelike suitable strategy, complete the missions, and take the win.

name: Toleo
description: Run, jump, slide, and flap your way through beautiful, hand-crafted worlds.

name: Madness: Project Nexus - Classic
description: A Run 'n Gun flash game based on Madness, a Newgrounds web series

name: Eye in the Dark
description: "Eye in the Dark" is a voxel-based horror game where you search for a mysterious eye in a twisted, haunted world filled with jump scares, suspense, and eerie creatures. Navigate maze-like levels, stay alert for surprises and unravel the mystery behind the eye.

name: He Who Watches
description: Manipulate gravity, walk on walls, and use your magical arrow to solve mind-bending puzzles in this grid-based dungeon puzzler. Decipher secrets of the canvas and search for the mythos known as He Who Watches in this continuation of the Dungeon Crawler Jam 2022 winning entry.

name: Trans Agent X
description: Evil gatekeepers. Transgendered protagonist. Overdue reckoning.This is a casual sci-fi action-adventure bullet-hell dodger about transgender people re-visiting a post-apocalyptic earth and searching for a lost artefact. A wholesome trauma-healing adventure.

name: Dungeon Dash: Tales of the Necromancer
description: Dungeon Dash is a fast paced puzzle arcade where you "Dash" your way through dungeons and maps. Customize your character, unlock new armor and build your town or compete against a friend in a procedurally generated dungeon.

name: Final Dose
description: Final Dose is an immersive stealth simulator game inspired by slasher horror movies. You are being pursued by a relentless AI that can see and hear you. You will need to explore every inch of an abandoned clinic and find items and puzzle pieces to unlock doors and crawl through vents. Run or hide under beds, in bathroom stalls and cabinets, crouch to move around silently, and do whatever it takes to figure out how to escape this place!

name: Hentai Sera
description: Hentai Sera is a relaxing puzzle game. With the theme of serafuku and 24 unique sexy girls. Enjoy sexy girls pictures and relaxing music to complete the puzzle.

name: Capybara Hotel
description: Welcome to Capybara Hotel! As a newly hired employee, your mission is to find the capybaras that are hidden around the hotel. Explore each area of the hotel, using your observation skills to discover where the capybaras have hidden.

name: Tsundere Milfin
description: Tsundere Milfin is a lighthearted and quirky match-3 puzzle game combined with a visual novel story. Solve puzzles and make the right choices in conversations to endear yourself and gain the favor of your boss.

name: Cavimilation
description: Cavimilation is a 2D shooter/platformer throwback to classic high score chasing games with the addition of modern roguelike elements. Explore an endless procedurally generated cave filled with treasure and monsters, where every mistake takes its toll and where every bullet counts.

name: Fishjong
description: Dive into the magical world of underwater Mahjong. Test your skills again and again on more than 100 levels. Customize your tiles, sets, backgrounds and tile shapes. Take a load off with the game's relaxing music and meditative gameplay.

name: Flowa
description: A relaxing 2D puzzle game about watering and collecting flowers. Plan an efficient route to the goal, complete bonus challenges, and collect as many flowers as you can!

name: Uwagaki Ai
description: A tragic story of repeated overwriting. Exploration type ADV I woke up in a laboratory. I immediately noticed something strange, but the erosion had begun. In a certain laboratory, I started an experiment. The first and last experiment for me, risking everything...

name: Pogo Joins the Circus
description: Pogo Joins The Circus takes the role of the eponymous Pogo Joe, a boy on a pogo stick. Holding the joystick button lets Pogo Joe jump over a barrel or empty space the width of a barrel. Falling off is impossible.

name: My Alien Roommate
description: When an alien boy named Enoch lands on your balcony one fateful Sunday evening, your life is changed forever. Can you keep your alien roommate a secret from the world?

name: Folklands
description: Folklands is a grid-based, relaxing settlement builder with simulated citizens. Grow your settlement from humble beginnings to a bustling town. Harvest resources, manage food supply and make sure your folks are happy, employed and safe.

name: A World to Win
description: A Cold War real-time grand strategy game. Players lead a country through the revolutions and superpower conflicts of the late 20th century, competing in the space race and nuclear arms race, destabilizing and overthrowing rival powers to expand their spheres of influence.

name: Mega Button Soccer
description: Mega Button Soccer is a reinvented version of traditional button soccer! With a fun story and charismatic characters, have fun with Cauã's journey to fulfill his dream of becoming the greatest button football player on Aru-Açu Island!

name: Battle of Darkness
description: Battle of Darkness is a dark fantasy game where you advance by destroying your enemies and fight to re-raise a Kingdom that has succumbed to darkness.

name: SpookLector
description: You are in an old long forgotten castle with the goal of finding lost treasures. Ghosts will constantly come across on your way - former residents of this castle, who still guarding their belongings. Find all the treasures and get rich!

name: Helpless
description: In the heat of deserted lands, a child and their mother weakened by sickness try to survive a harsh world. Through a kid’s perspective, take action and explore the remains of a lost past. Protect yourself from the sun’s immense intensity and help your family get back on the road.

name: Chest
description: The story of Chest is about Capulet, who has forgotten how to undo the spell after having transformed into a Chest for a time until found by Zong. Having turned back human with Zong's help, Capulet then decided to go on the quest to help those who have also turned into chests.

name: Grasping
description: Mortalis Institute's patented Helper Bond System provides quick and easy diagnosis for physical trauma. Place your arm in the device and follow the simple instructions to receive a diagnosis.

name: Maimai DX Festival
description: maimai Deluxe FESTiVAL is the fourth entry of the Maimai Deluxe series, successor of the maimai series. The game is played using touch screen or buttons on a large cabinet with a circular screen.

name: Super Breakout
description: Game Boy port of Super Breakout, released alongside Battlezone.

name: Jazzy the Frog Goes Home for the Holidays
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Breakout
description: Game Boy Color port of Super Breakout.

name: Mother Bird Horror Story Ch2
description:
After you escaped from MOMO in your house, you lost your sanity. The asylum is you home now.
But did you really get away from IT ? Is It real or it's just in your head ?
You are about to find out in this thrilling horror adventure.
Solve the puzzles and fight scary mental patients while you trying to leave the madhouse.

name: The Front
description: The Front is a survival-open-world-crafting shooter game. Players will assume the role of a resistance fighter sent back in time to stop the rise of a tyrannical empire that has conquered the world using technology based on unknown relics.

name: Eeriest Night
description:
What if you walked into an abandoned building where mannequins tried to strangle you when you weren't looking at them?

Welcome to The Psychological Horror Game of Mannequins in process: Eeriest Night.

Will you discover the secrets of this place?

name: Go Fly a Kite
description: A game about going to fly a kite and what would bring someone to do such a thing.

name: Demon's Gamble
description:
A mechanical A.I. God has kept you alive for one thousand years.
It wants to play a game to finally let you die.
Roll the dice, will you escape your fate or face an eternity of horror?

name: World of Prandis
description:
Let's join with all the users from all over the world
You become one of the two camps Femina or Virr.
You can roam freely in this massively multiplayer online game.
If you are tired of mass-produced auto games, you’ll enjoy this, it’s known as the pocket WoW of its time.

name: Love's Hella Punk
description: Love's Hella Punk is an otome game by Voltage Inc. You are a good-natured and peace-seeking high school girl whose world is flipped upside down when a bad boy delinquent proposes to you out of the blue. Daily bombarded by his infatuation for you, he is the only thing on your mind – for better or worse.

name: Professional Boyfriend
description: An otome game by Voltage Inc.

name: Oops, I said Yes?!
description:
I lived a fun and trendy life as a working woman, but after a night of drinking, I found myself married to a coworker!?

A welcome home kiss, a ring on my finger... I shouldn't feel love for a contract marriage, but why does my heart beat so fast?

An oath and a marriage registration later, can love be born from marriage?

name: Love My Pegasus
description:
In a night full of shooting stars, a prince descends from heaven, claiming you'll be the savior of his country!?

A collaboration with Fuji TV's dorama "Oshi no Ouji-sama".

name: Tokyo Love Hustle
description: Otome game by Voltage.

name: Blood Pact
description: Blood Pact is a queer erotica Twine series about a trans girl named Alexa who accidentally unleashes Felanya, a domineering trans succubus. The story follows their exploits as Alexa enters into a D/s relationship with Felanya and embraces their sapphic occult Blood Pact.

name: Plust: Loving U So True
description: Otome game by Voltage.

name: Blood Pact: Premium Edition
description: Blood Pact Premium Edition includes Nikatine's new narration from the December 2019 free update, three new illustrations, and all artwork colored by Callie. Enjoy Blood Pact the way it was envisioned. Downloads also include bonus high resolution images for all in-game art from both the premium and free Blood Pact releases.

name: The Prince is Dead
description:
You've never really felt at home in The Abyss.

Your father, er, the Demon King... he's always been cold, but he's only gotten worse with time. You feel like you spend every day running from something. Whether its your past, your responsibility, or even yourself... but you can never quite escape.

That's why, when you catch an adventurer wandering the upper layers of your home, you decide to accompany her descent. She needs safe passage, and you'll never learn the truth of the world around you by moping alone.

The journey doesn't scare you. You don't fear the depths. You're only scared of what they might bring up from within you.

name: Transubstantiation Synthesis
description:
This game is horny for drones, robots, mind/body control, and the future.

Transubstantiation Synthesis is a work of futurology. What will the world of tomorrow look like? Which trends are currently in place, and what do they mean for us?

name: Diary of a Step-Sister
description: Diary of a Step-Sister is an otome game by Voltage.

name: Sweet Cafe
description: Sweet Cafe is a special Voltage app that incorporates all the characters from the games. They contain special stories that are specific to the app and sometimes even crossovers between two or more games are included. However, not all of Voltage's games are included - dropped games are currently not included.

name: Enthralled
description:
Enthralled is a hypnotic game about getting seduced and mind-controlled by a demanding vampire queen, played by the Secret Subject!

It uses real hypnosis and toys heavily with D/s dynamics, fractionation, obedience, getting turned into a vampire's mindless thrall, being told to resist trance (and failing), and being made to wear a collar.

name: Marble Blast Platinum
description: Marble Blast Platinum (aka MBP) is a standalone modification of Marble Blast Gold released in 2007.

name: NBA Now 23
description: Experience an exciting NBA experience by playing on real NBA courts with real NBA players.

name: Block Brain
description:
Tackle one of the toughest puzzle games available!
Block Brain challenges you to figure things out for yourself. Unlock a dozen different gadgets and use them to solve increasingly difficult puzzles. Only the brave and persistent will reach the end.

name: Kitty & Friends: Blast of Fun
description: Dive into the world with our characters Kitty the Leader, Panda the Chef and Doggy the Athlete and many more! Help our characters in learning and discovering new things, by completing different addictive levels in each story! Blast toy cubes and create bonuses, blast the whole place!

name: Touch Carrom: Striker Edition
description: Touch Carrom brings favorite carrom board game to the iPhone and iPod Touch. Touch based game controls give the players very realistic game play. The passion and skills transfer very well to the iPhone experience.

name: The Lilows 2
description: Board game made by people who love games. Because we can.

name: Air Hockey: Championship 3D+
description:
Air Hockey is new funny game with clean and nice design.
The goal is to shoot 10 goals to win!
The game is made for up to two players or you can train alone.

name: Freestyle Baseball 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Tap Soccer: Champions
description:
Tap Soccer is a casual football / soccer game.
Be a superstar on the stadium, and take on the World with your soccer skills. Make sure to win every match as you march towards glory. AI has a challenging simulated football behavior.

name: Wheelie 2
description:
Wheelie is back and now, he have found the love of his life.
He needs your brainpower to reach his goal.

name: Bog Racer
description:
You have two paths: forward across bridge or over to feed the fish.
In order to avoid falling into water, touch the screen when the car is approaching the edge of the bridge.

name: Betrayed Alliance: Book 2
description: A Sierra-style EGA parser adventure game featuring 2 playable characters lost in a cursed forest.

name: Dino Surf
description: Race to the finish with your favorite Webosaur in Dino Surf! Tilt your iPhone screen face up and down to maneuver through obstacles and jump over ramps. You can even run over arrows to get a speed boost, but don’t wipe out! If you make it to the finish line you can move on to the next level, and maybe even make the High Score board. Challenge your friends to play too and see who’s the best at Dino Surf.

name: Slot Car HTR+ : 3D Simulation
description: How about a little trip back to the past with one of the most loved toys? Pull the trigger and put your tiny plastic bolide in a low flying in a huge variety of tracks trying to avoid be throw out by the other insane competitors. Start racing in 3 different difficulty levels and 20 tracks that include several challenges like loops, jumps, tricky crossroads, narrows and high speed curves. You can even build your own tracks with the highly intuitive track editor and share your tracks online with others players.

name: Redline F-1 Racer
description: North American port of Aguri Suzuki F-1 Super Driving. The only difference is that this version has no relation with the driver in a licensing standpoint, but he is still depicted in-game.

name: Anchors: Blockade Zone
description: Anchors: blockaded zero is a Cthulhu style 2d shooting game. The game requires players to explore in various maps generated by the program, find and bring back equipment, and live in a base full of doomsday atmosphere. When you explore the map, you see some strange things, calm down. Maybe that's truth!

name: Daiz
description: Simple game based on Othello.

name: Super Mario Bros. 3: The Lost Levels
description: Super Mario Bros. 3: The Lost Levels is a rom hack that implements all of the unused levels in Super Mario Bros. 3 into the game.

name: Hotshots Fire Rescue
description: Sin descripción

name: Outnumbered
description: Sin descripción

name: Jet Blaster
description: Sin descripción

name: Perfection
description: Players have a set amount of time to match the shape in the center screen. Once they find the match, they have push the large bubble button. Try to match all the shapes before your time is up.

name: Hululuup
description: Hululuup is a VR musical flying game. Fly through the VJ loops as fast as you can. Collect Items and Destroy Obstacles. You can even create your own levels and share with friends.

name: Stick War: Legacy
description:
One of the most popular and highly rated web games of all time is now coming to mobile!

Play Stick War, one of the biggest, most fun, challenging and addictive stick figure games. Control your army in formations or play with each unit, you have full control of each doll. Build units, mine for gold, learn the path of the sword, spear, archer, mage, and even the giant. Destroy the enemy statue and capture all the territories!

name: Dead Spreading: Survival
description: Sin descripción

name: American Marksman
description: Sin descripción

name: Bad 2 Bad: Apocalypse
description: 'Bad 2 Bad: Apocalypse' is the sequel to 'Bad 2 Bad: Delta' and 'Extinction', armed with a vaster world and richer content. Apocalypse follows the story of the Delta Team, led by Major Pan, saving and reconstructing the world ravaged by a virus from the Human Forces. Join the Delta Team on their journey from survival to rebuilding the world.

name: Prizefighters
description: Arcade boxing has made its return to the ring! Punch, block, and dodge your way up the ranks with simple one-hand touch controls and fast action gameplay. Time your dodges successfully and you'll be rewarded an opportunity for a knock-out punch. However, one mistimed maneuver can mean the difference between shining in the bright lights to being lights-out on the canvas!

name: Little Panda's Restaurant
description: Sin descripción

name: Training Hero
description: Sin descripción

name: Cat Forest: Healing Camp
description: Sin descripción

name: Cat Game: The Cats Collector!
description: Sin descripción

name: Blood Strike
description: Charge into fast paced combat in modes such as Battle Royale, Squad Fight or Hot Zone alone or with friends. Blood Strike offers a wide range of playable Strikers, each with a unique active and passive ability letting you deploy drones, shield walls and everything in between. Customize your weapons to your liking and get ready to prove that you have what it takes to come out on top!

name: Naval Creed: Warships
description: Sin descripción

name: Motherbird: The Dark One
description:
Motherbird Captured You. You are in abandoned Hospital. Place is full of dangers and hidding places.
Motherbird can hear you always. So be quiet and try to get out of this prison.
Escape or die trying. That is your goal! You have 5 days.
Good Luck!

name: Post Hero
description: Post Hero is an adventure game where you play as a mail carrier on his first day on the job. What should be a walk in the park turns out to be anything but! Who knew you'd need to outsmart a vampire, help someone change a flat tire, foil a porch pirate, save a relationship and learn magic just to drop off some packages? All of this and more awaits you in Post Hero!

name: Pocket Lights
description: The classic light-toggling game for the Panic Playdate!

name: Ninja Gaiden
description: 16-bit port of the NES version of Ninja Gaiden, released in Ninja Gaiden Trilogy.

name: Betrayed Alliance: Book 1
description: A Sierra-style EGA parser adventure game. The first Book in a planned Trilogy of fantasy adventure games.

name: Ninja Gaiden II: The Dark Sword of Chaos
description: 16-bit port of Ninja Gaiden II: The Dark Sword of Chaos, released in Ninja Gaiden Trilogy.

name: Ninja Gaiden III: The Ancient Ship of Doom
description: 16-bit port of Ninja Gaiden III: The Ancient Ship of Doom, released in Ninja Gaiden Trilogy. It is based on the Japanese version of the game, which is more balanced than the North American version.

name: Ninja Ryuukenden III: Yomi no Hakobune
description: The original Japanese version of Ninja Gaiden III. When the game was ported to North America, the game was made harder on purpose with the removal of the password feature and with a boost of damage inflicted by the enemies.

name: Pokémon Violet: The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero - Part 1: The Teal Mask
description: Part 1 of the story expansion for Pokémon Violet.

name: Pokémon Scarlet: The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero - Part 1: The Teal Mask
description: Part 1 of the story expansion for Pokémon Scarlet

name: Pokémon Scarlet: The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero - Part 2: The Indigo Disk
description: Part 2 of the story expansion for Pokémon Scarlet.

name: Pokémon Violet: The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero - Part 2: The Indigo Disk
description: Part 2 of the story expansion for Pokémon Violet.

name: Pokémon Violet: The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero
description: A two-part story expansion for Pokémon Violet.

name: Pokémon Scarlet: The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero
description: A two-part story expansion for Pokémon Scarlet.

name: Doctor Who: Slitheen Surfer
description: Can you guide Margaret Slitheen to safety? She wants to leave this dead end dump and return back to civilisation.

name: Xonix
description: Xonix is a classic arcade-style DOS game which was probably inspired by Qix. In the game, the player controls a small marker that moves on a rectangular playfield. The goal is to claim a certain percentage of the playfield by drawing lines with the marker around areas that have not been claimed yet. The player must avoid collisions with balls bouncing around the playfield to avoid losing a life.

name: The Secret of the Blue Water
description: One of the games based on the Nadia: The Secret of Blue Water series.

name: Lady Bono!!
description: Sin descripción

name: Pixel Ranger
description: The evil aliens took away everything the Pixel Ranger ever loved. So now, as long as there is a single pixel left in him, he will fight the vicious extraterrestrials. It’s your job to guide the Pixel Ranger as he shoots his way through hordes of alien invaders. Aim carefully, dodge their lasers and blast them to pixels!

name: Polandball: Not Safe for World
description:
The world is in danger, rioters rioting, terrorists terrorising, zombies zombieing. America the World Police just invite you to be his sidekick. Only YOU, can save the world and bring world peace, because you are the chosen one, you are the one with passion and kindness and the will of justice, and because America lacks of a partner to do good cop bad cop stuff. So, let's press the nuclear button, and neutralize all evil nations, for JUSTICE!!!
