The gameplay is simple, you roll the earth to find countries with problems, and then attack them until they have no problem. You have to do it before global happiness or population get too low. You can choose 3 weapons (totally 13 for now) in one game.

name: The Thaumaturge
description: The Thaumaturge is a story-driven RPG with morally ambiguous choices, taking place in the culturally diverse world of early 20th century Warsaw. In this world, Salutors exist: esoteric beings that only Thaumaturges can truly perceive and use for their needs.

name: Noughts & Crosses
description: Naughts & Crosses is puzzle game for the Super Nintendo, that was added in special SNES systems for Airplanes and Hotels.

name: Hangman
description: Hangman is a game exclusively released in the Nintendo Gateway System for hotel and airline use only.

name: Postcard Puzzle
description: Postcard Puzzle is a game released exclusively in the Nintendo Gateway System for use in airlines and hotels.

name: Cache Grabbers
description: Cache Grabbers is a chill first-person cartography puzzle game. Navigate through 30 levels in a strange environment, using only your compass, metal detector and shovel to find and grab the cache — and maybe even a way to escape.

name: Ukungu
description: Sin descripción

name: Molehill Empire
description:
Molehill Empire is a fun economy simulation, revolving entirely around the microcosm garden. As free browser game it runs entirely in your web browser, without any additional downloads or software!
Given the task of an industrious garden gnome, you'll be able to create your very own private Garden of Eden. Lettuce, carrots, strawberries, spinach or onions - it's up to you which plants you want to grow. Visit the friendly towns of Green Valley and Hedgerow Ville to trade with other players, purchase new plants and decorations to spice up your own garden, deliver your customer's orders and always make sure to be a good neighbour ... or you might wake up one day to find your garden infested by an army of moles...

name: Shape of Mind
description: Shape of Mind is a simple puzzle game similar to Solitaire card games. Connect shapes by dragging them on the board. Shapes of the same color won't connect. You can move strips of connected shapes by grabbing the top-most shape of a strip. Drop shapes onto the Dreamer to begin a Halo. Shapes in the Halo cannot be removed. Once a Halo is complete the shapes will disappear. Complete three Halos to clear all the shapes and win the game!

name: Five Nights at Old Toy Factory
description: You are working as a night guard at the old toy factory. Some strange stuff is happening over night. Explore and stay alive. Find clues to what is going on here. Your shift starts at 00h ( midnight ) and ends at 06h. The only thing you need is to survive. How hard can it be ?

name: Road Trip: USA 2 West Collector's Edition
description: This time, explore beautiful locations spanning the Western states as you hunt for hidden objects. Hidden Object enthusiasts will rejoice with over 2,200 objects to locate across multiple game modes and beautiful hi-resolution scenes! For a change of pace, test your puzzle solving skills against a fun selection of 8 mini games! Don’t miss this trip of a lifetime!

name: Glass Masquerade: Origins
description:
Welcome to Glass Masquerade - an artistic puzzle game inspired by Art Deco & stained glass artisans of the 20th century. You need to combine hidden glass pieces to unveil clocks and themes exhibited by various cultures of the world at the 'International Times Exhibition' - an interactive electronic show.
The Origin's edition includes all the previously released DLCs

name: Southern Cross
description: The tale of a wandering swordsman seeking the Strongest, at the end of his journey.

name: Rottenwood Lake
description: This game was crafted with love in a weekend for the Haunted PS1 game jam.

name: A Bonte Christmas
description: Ho ho ho, it's a tradition here every year that I make a Christmas themed game and it's that time again! I'm presenting my Christmas present for you: a brand new bontegame! Enjoy a Bonte Christmas! Can you complete all 16 levels? Spread the word, share the game and merry puzzling! Cheers!

name: Off to Work We Go
description:
This short game was developed for the No Future Contest, a 'no future' game development contest with technical constraints and with a compulsory theme 'au travail/work it'.

The technical constraint I chose was to not have a single word or letter in the game.
The 15 best games created for contest will be displayed on arcade cabinets during September and October in Paris in Visages du Monde.

That being said, I hope you enjoy off to work we go! Use the cursor keys to move and use the mouse to look around. You will need the Unity webplayer if you haven't installed it.

You find a work facility on a lonely island. But what happens next, is it a strange dream or corporate reality...

name: Sugar, Sugar 2
description:
By popular demand I made a sequel to that sugary puzzler. So here it is, enjoy sugar, sugar 2 !
Draw and get enough sugar in the cups and complete the 30 brand new levels to unlock a brand new freeplay mode.
If you like the game, please take a moment to share the game on facebook, twitter or wherever you want, thanks!

name: Cut Strings
description:
Media that wants to stay lost.

A horror blogger stumbles upon a series of lost media finds that leads them to uncover the mystery of characters "escaping" from their source material.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Rewritten
description: Five Nights at Freddy's Rewritten is a re-imagining of FNAF 1.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Rewritten - 87'
description: FNAF Rewritten: '87 is a re-imagining of FNAF 2.

name: Plants vs. Zombies 2: First Person
description: Plants vs Zombies 2, but first person! See all of the new time periods, plants, and zombies in 3D!

name: Five Nights at Sid's
description: A Five NIght's fangame featuring Ice Age characters. Heavily inspired by the "Bora Tomar Uma" meme.

name: We Are Not Free
description: Sin descripción

name: My Ocean Project
description: I made this experience after watching "My Octopus Teacher" on Netflix. I've always wanted to make a underwater environment for an exploration game but I never found a place to implement it. After watching the movie I just wanted to do it anyway without any gameplay elements at all.

name: AAA Clock 2: Special Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Starblast: 3D Wars
description: Twinstick with 3D graphics.

name: Retro Style: Pixel Art Jigsaw Puzzles - Expansion Pack 1
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces.

name: Find the Energy
description: Find the Energy is a free educational game for all ages that teaches about renewable energy via exploration and quests.

name: Heirloom
description: A simple 2D platformer. Run, jump and avoid obstacles through 7 levels. Explore a beautiful, hand-crafted pixel world. Meet captivating NPCs and reach the Old Summit to retrieve the family Heirloom.

name: Drift Experience Japan: Supporter Edition
description: Get the Supporter Edition of Drift Experience Japan and enhance your experience with new maps and extra content!

name: Ultraviolet Dawn
description:
There is no single predefined way to play - everything is entirely up to you. You chose what you want to be and how you want to play. You can be a peaceful merchant, shuttling goods between stars. You can be an outlaw, attacking innocent ships and capturing their cargo. You can be a smuggler, trading in illegal goods banned by the the Intergalactic Federation. You can even run missions, both legal and illegal.
There is so much to the game. Not only can you upgrade your ships weapons, but you can also upgrade equipment, such as adding more powerful engines or faster regenerating shields. You can even trade your ship in and fly something else entirely, whether a captured pirate ship or a large, bulky cargo carrier.

name: The Last Runner
description:
A fast runner that you can play with one hand, tap or double tap to overcome obstacles in your way!
Ray, our hero, is an experienced runner with parkour knowledges. He was born in Cat Town 18 years ago, but today that town is not the same. Now it's an abandoned place, dangerous, with radiactive waters and infected cats...
But Ray is a great runner and adventurer (a bit opportunist), he knows about Cat Town's treasures, there's a lot of coins and hidden treasures and he's ready to collect it all!

name: Panel Attack!
description: Connect 3 or more panels of the same color to make them disappear. Pannels appear from the bottom and run to the top, so you must keep them low!

name: My Magic 2048
description:
My Magic 2048 is an addictive number game.
Join the numbers and get to the 2048 tile,or 4096 tile.
Swipe to move all tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into a larger one. You can choose different type to enjoy. Adventure or time model for you explore.

name: Office Kissing
description:
This is a very interesting game themes, and its operation is very simple.
However, to test your reaction speed, and play when you will feel very exciting.
In the serious business hours, you need to take your time of period which your boss turns back.

name: The Labyrinth
description:
The Labyrinth game where you control the ball while avoiding holes and traps to reach the destination.
50 Gorgeous looking levels with challenging puzzles to solve.
Calibrate and play the way you hold your device.

name: The Fifteen Puzzle
description: Drag. Drag. Drag. Get ready for an addictive and challenging game!

name: Tavern Brawl: Tactics
description: Love turn-based strategy games but don't have much time playing? Try Tavern Brawl - Tactics! It's easy to handle and very charming!

name: Swish
description: Swish is a massively multiplayer online basketball game. Your goal is to make as many points as you can in global contests that last 1 minute. At the end of every game, the top 20 player are displayed.

name: Stickman Basketball Blitz
description: Experience pure basketball fun with fast paced gameplay, an astonishing atmosphere, stunning smooth animations, simple controls, insane action and tons of replay value.

name: Speed on the Grid
description: Speed On The Grid is a simple yet very addictive game where you have to keep a ball on the grid by moving it side to side and jumping over gaps to get to the end of each level marked by the yellow platforms! It seems easy at the beginning, but don't be fooled! As you go through the game it becomes more and more difficult, sometimes (almost) Impossible! ...and you have more than 70 levels to solve!

name: Soccer Stars: Football Kick
description:
Compete in different tiers, from different countries! Play online against people from all over the world or against your friends! Login with your Facebook account and challenge your friends to show them what it means to be a Soccer Legend and take the cup home! Oh, and you can also play offline against a friend in the same device!
You can also customize your Soccer Stars experience by collecting the different teams! Show off your style and defend your nation’s colors!

name: Slappy Limbs
description:
To earn your Black Belt is a simple task...
You only have to survive a four minute battle with Ninja Stars and wooden planks...

name: Sea Monster Simulator
description: Remember the monsters from your worst nightmares? Bring those nightmares to life as you control this huge Sea Monster. Eat all the people you can before the timer runs out. Complete 8 fun missions or go for the high score. Go racing around the beach. Go in search of some great white sharks to eat. Total 3D Sea Monster Rampage!

name: Pooties
description:
Welcome to the colorful world of Pooties!
Help these cuties to reclaim their stock of food from bad penguins.
Use the power of delicious meals to slide and put penguins in their place!
Drift on ice, collect food to keep going, make spins and slide the longest distance to earn as much coins as you can! Coins will let you buy scratches and win awesome prizes!

name: Connect & Pop
description: As in the original game, the goal of Connect & Pop is for players to connect four or more of their pieces horizontally, vertically, or diagonally. Connect & Pop goes beyond the classic Connect Four game by including a pop mode, larger playing board, five levels of artificial intelligence ideal for all types of players.

name: Charles
description:
Avoid quickly the enemies coming by moving the plane.
It`s not just Dodge. You can kill the enemies with items.
Whose plane will live longer?
You will be a fantastic player if you avoid more than 5 minutes.

name: Bangalore Auto
description: Twist and dodge out of control traffic including cows,elephants and insane bus drivers as you pick up passengers that throng the roads of Bangalore,India.

name: Hide-n-Seek
description: Hide-n-Seek is the 3rd game in the quirky series of dueling games that will ultimately challenge your eyes and your memory.

name: Groops
description: Groops is a puzzle game that will put your mind to the test. Match tiles three at a time based on either shared or completely unique attributes - the number of possibilities will tie your brain in knots! Keep your mind sharp.

name: Devil's Peak Fury
description:
Devil's Peak Fury, is an endless race across the wasteland, a race for survival and glory. Speed across the wasteland, pitting your driving skills against countless warriors in nitrous boosted trucks and cars.
See how far you can survive along this mountain wasteland road known as Devil's peak, filled with enemy cars, destruction, carnage and surprises.

name: Fanais Chess
description:
Command a space fleet to victory!
You are in command of an entire fleet of space ships! Only you can win the battle for your people! Make your foes rue the day they ever meet you!

name: Fitness Gym Bodybuilding Pump
description:
Interested in boxing, fitness and bodybuilding?
Do you dream of becoming the coolest boxer and knocking out your opponents in packs?
Do you want to be the most powerful in the gym?
Download the game and let's get started!
Here is a game that can make your fingers tremble with tension, performing the next approach!

name: Ghosted
description: Guide the ghosts home by solving color puzzles. After solving color puzzles designed by a unique master, you will soon become a puzzle master too. Oh, and don't miss Master's big band music.

name: The Outer Worlds: Spacer's Choice Edition
description: The Outer Worlds: Spacer's Choice Edition is the ultimate way to play the award-winning RPG from Obsidian Entertainment and Private Division. Including the base game and all DLC, this remastered masterpiece is the absolute best version of The Outer Worlds.

name: Street Fighter II
description: Game Boy port of Street Fighter II.

name: Street Fighter II
description: The Amiga port of Street Fighter II.

name: Street Fighter II
description: Commodore 64 port of Street Fighter II.

name: Street Fighter II
description: Atari ST port of Street Fighter II.

name: Street Fighter II
description: ZX Spectrum port of Street Fighter II.

name: Pokémon Floral Tempus EX
description: Pokémon Floral Tempus EX is a fan game that is set in the beautiful yet corrupt region of Rialtra. When the time arrives, the protagonist and their two friends decide to embark on their brand new adventure, brimming with eagerness and hope. Unbeknownst to them, the evil Team Blight have been secretly planting their seeds of fate that will eventually entangle the three adventurers. Only time will reveal the real intentions of Team Blight and the shady institutions of Rialtra.

name: Pokemon Heads & Tails
description: Pokémon Heads & Tails is a Spanish, superhero-themed Pokémon Fan Game developed during the summer of 2017 and 2018. Launched originally only in Spanish, the game has been recently translated to English. The game has a superhero-themed story, with an extensive post-game after finishing the Pokémon League that serves as a second half for the overall plot.

name: Z Day Shootout
description:
Do you love old school shooters ? Z Day Shootout is just that! Lot of weapons, lot of zombies. Just search and destroy! It happend so fast! We didn't see it coming! The Virus was Spreading So quickly!... Soon everyone got infected! Well, not everyone... There is still a few of us. Fighting. Surviving! I was chosen for this mission! Best survivor, best GUNMAN! It's up to me to clean this Town of the Undead!

So What are you waiting for ? Pick up Your GUN and DO the Dirty Work! Good Luck. You're gonna need it!

name: Momo
description:
Momo is a horror game based on the history of the whatssap user "momo", in the game, you will be a guy that contacts momo by whatsapp, and now he will be pursued by the monster of momo.

You will have to complete some tasks before get rescued, like search things, hide, close doors, etc.

The objetive is to survive until the timer reachs 00:00 then, the police will arrive and you would able to escape.

name: Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree
description: The Shadow of the Erdtree is a fully-fledged expansion that features an all-new story set in the Land of Shadow. It adds a whole new map with 70 new weapons, ten new shields, 39 new Talismans, 14 new sorceries, 28 new incantations, 20 new Spirit Ashes, 25 New Ashes of War, 30 new armour sets, and new consumables and craftables.

name: Dungeons & Jewels
description:
Dungeons & Jewels is a Tile-Matching Roguelike.
Collect Relics. Learn Spells. Fight monsters and use your abilities by matching tiles, creating combos, and solving puzzles!

name: Hop Mania
description: Hop Mania is a game included in the Google Play Games app.

name: Call of Duty: Vietnam
description:
Call of Duty: Vietnam is a cancelled installment of the Call of Duty series that was under development by Sledgehammer Games. It was stated to be taking place in the 1960s and 1970s, in Cambodia, Vietnam and Laos.

The game was planned to be in the action/adventure genre and would've been the first third-person only Call of Duty game. After eight months of development, the game had up to 15 minutes playable, at which point Activision offered Sledgehammer the opportunity to help Infinity Ward in the development of Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3.

name: Robocock
description: Far future. All maral principles have been erased, complete debauchery and chaos are happening on the streets. An unknown company creates an advanced robot to fight depravity and lust in the name of family values.

name: Three Lilies and Their Ghost Stories
description: Three different areas, three different decades, three different tales. A visual novel defined as a "kinetic story anthology".

name: It Gets So Lonely Here
description:
You are running through a forest.

It is late at night and the sky is as black as pitch.

The trees which surround you, jutting out of the earth like eerie monuments to a foreign god, are blotting out most of the moonlight.

You do not know where you are going.

You have no map; no route; no plan.

You have no desire, as you run, save to escape.

You cannot let yourself be caught.

All you can do is run, on and on and on...

But, despite all of your hard work, your best efforts will, invariably, be in vain. It’s already too late for you. After all...

You’ll never be able to escape from me.

name: Cockroach Simulator: Household Survivor
description:
Cockroach Simulator: Household Survivor Allows you to simulate being a cockroach that even you can't imagine. In its view, you too are a terrible thing.

This is not the adventure to the wonderland.
Neither not the role playing as the superhero or protagonist on the viral television programs.
If you are looking something new, such as role playing as a creature even you are scary of, we are proudly introducing you a Cockroach Simulator!
The simulator game that letting you survive in the dirty house of huntsman as a cockroach.
Enjoy your cockroach life with a lovely fatty uncle in Cockroach Simulator household survivor today!!

name: Pokémon Shield + Expansion Pass
description:
A bundle pack that contains the same game content you would receive by purchasing Pokémon Shield and it's Expansion Pass separately.

For those of you who haven’t yet started an adventure in the Galar region, here’s your chance to experience everything it has to offer!

name: Ultimate Double Dragon
description: This is a new fan-game dedicated to Double Dragons based on Super Double Dragon on SNES. New special effects and animations, super combinations and spectacular performances. New characters and new challenges that you will have to defeat, many new weapons, and maps. So many combat combinations that you will have to learn will keep you on the keyboard for a very long time.

name: Bongo
description: As an explorer you have to avoid a red dinosaur as you try to get from the left of a huge cavern and traverse 27 screens to the right. As you move through each screen, various obstacles must be avoided such as falling rocks, lava and birds. If you dawdle for too long, the dinosaur appears behind you and chases you until you make it to the end of the screen. There are also treasures to collect and if you get six in a row without dying you receive a bonus. On the last screen, you need to try and trap the dinosaur in a cage.

name: Pokémon Sword + Expansion Pass
description:
A bundle pack that contains the same game content you would receive by purchasing Pokémon Sword and it's Expansion Pass separately.

For those of you who haven’t yet started an adventure in the Galar region, here’s your chance to experience everything it has to offer!

name: Botanic
description:
A maze game where the player controls a caterpillar, traversing branches of a tree and eating leaves. The leaves obscure various junctions in the maze, so you are not sure if you’re going to hit a dead end until you munch the leaf.
Enemy bugs are hunting you as you navigate the levels, but there is a power up you can collect that works like the power pills in Pac-man and allows you to chase and eat the enemies for a short time.

name: Spider Queen Cave
description: The student sister who has been secretly in love for a long time has been missing for three months. Tonight, my sister suddenly called and asked me to go to an abandoned villa in the suburbs. I have no choice but to prepare for departure. It is said that the villa is a famous and dangerous house.

name: The Night Driver
description: The Night Driver is a point and click, RPG, adult game. Set in a dark and dirty world, full of drug dealers, prostitutes, criminals, and liars.

name: Doggnation
description: Sin descripción

name: Paradise Killer: Collector's Edition
description:
Paradise Killer: Collector's Edition includes:
- Physical copy of the game
- Lenticular Art Card
- Vinyl Sticker Sheet
- Soundtrack Download Card
- Padded Mousepad Featuring Crimson Acid
- Acrylic Charm Featuring Shinji
- 5 Acrylic Character Standees
- Collector's Edition Box

name: UnMetal: Collector's Edition
description:
The Collector’s Edition includes:
- Standard Edition (Switch or PS4)
- User Manual
- Physical OST
- Dog-Tag Necklace (2 pieces)
- UnMetal Thermo-adhesive Patch Badge
- Artbook
- Postcard
- Collector's Box.

name: Greyhill Incident: Abducted Edition
description: Greyhill Incident is a story-driven Survival-Horror game that takes place during the early 90s. As Ryan Baker, equipped with a baseball bat and a few bullets in his trusty revolver, the story takes you across the atmospheric neighbourhood of Greyhill, which is invaded by UFOs & Grey Aliens.

name: Must Pop Words
description: Sin descripción

name: Bus Simulator 21: Next Stop
description: It's your stop! Bus Simulator 21 Next Stop is here! Enjoy many game improvements and a brand-new game mode with this comprehensive update. Career Mode combines Sandbox Mode with the campaign's economic system. Download the update now and experience Bus Simulator 21 anew.

name: Bus Simulator 21: Next Stop - Gold Edition
description: Bus Simulator 21 Next Stop - Gold Edition offers new bus fans an all-in-one package. In addition to Bus Simulator 21, it includes all previously released premium DLCs, as well as the free Next Stop update and its numerous game improvements, brand-new game mode, and official map extension.

name: RayStorm x RayCrisis HD Collection
description: Relive the excitement of lock-on laser shooting and epic sci-fi battles with two of TAITO’s most respected vertical shoot‘em ups – Both original arcade and HD versions!

name: A Mountain of One
description: NYX and AMO1 have collaborated to bring you a fantastic musical VR experience that will have you blown away by the photo-realistic scenery of an otherworldly forest. Line up the AMO1 sign at the beginning and play the debut track from AMO1 - Custards Last Stand from the album - Stars Planets Dust Me

name: Sexy New Year
description: Sexy New Year - is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: Endless Railway
description: Use the machine gun to kill zombies to clear the railroad

name: Aniballs
description: Aniballs is a racing game where you control small animals in balls and race. Players roll through unique 2D circuits with a side camera and can throw objects such as spears, bombs, or time stops at each other!

name: Little Garden
description: Growth plants on your island and make a delicious meal with these plants. If you have enough gold, you can expand your island! Unlock dozens of cards at each farm level and improve your income. You can make things easier by automating your farm with amazing tools.

name: Crazy Clown
description: Crazy Clown - Top Down Shooter, a game in which you need to take your own and destroy all your abusers. You have not only a machine gun in your arsenal. Use all the variety of weapons and crush your enemies. Take revenge on them, clowns can not only make fun!

name: Best Pearl
description: Best Pearl is a shooter where one of the sea inhabitants repels attacks, protecting the pearl he found. Be careful the steering wheel landing can hurt you. Don't let them get it. They must not reach her. You can handle it.

name: Deeper in the Dark
description: You like Sci-Fi games? You like FPS? You like games with secret items, collectables? You like short Indie games? Then you will love this game! The game takes place in a big mothership captured by aliens. Your mission is to kill all the aliens, and blow up the mothership.

name: The Adventures of LinShanHai: Chapter 2 - Bus Bombing
description: The bus to the suburbs suddenly exploded, the scene was a mess, the sales staff, including all 10 people on board died. Lin Shanhai led the scene investigation team to conduct a detailed investigation and visited all the families and friends of the deceased, but the case is still no clue.

name: PowerWash Simulator: Midgar Special Pack
description: Your PowerWashing Services are needed in Midgar! From the gritty yet gripping world of one of Final Fantasy's most unforgettable installments comes five filthy new maps for PowerWash Simulator, featuring iconic locations, vehicles, and enemies.

name: Within
description: Explore a broken world and gain the power to fix it, dealing with demonic adversaries along the way.

name: Conur Life
description: Survive the streets of San Hugo facing all kinds of problems in this open world located in Argentina.

name: Fabulous Field Trip
description: Fabulous Field Trip is an island excursion game full of learning and fun suitable for children aged 9-12 and adults of all ages.

name: Bridge to Another World: Cursed Clouds
description: Gather your courage for this mystical journey to a distant world!

name: To The Rescue!: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Kerosuke no Kancho Kunren
description: Sin descripción

name: Tents and Trees
description:
Place a tent next to each tree in this original nature puzzle game!

The numbers around the grid tell you how many tents must be placed in each row and column. Be careful, tents can’t touch each other.

Don't guess! Use your logic and carefully plan your every move. Each level has only one unique solution. Come up with your own strategies for solving larger grids and more-challenging levels.

name: Maze Quest
description: Sin descripción

name: Destiny 2: Lightfall - Season of Defiance
description: In the aftermath of the attack on the Traveler, the Vanguard calls upon its closest allies. Guardians must master the righteous powers of the Awoken to stand against the encroaching Shadow Legion and prove themselves as Queensguard.

name: Oppai Odyssey
description: Oppai Odyssey is an adult visual novel and dating sim, focusing on the crew of USF starship Agni as they traverse the galaxy in search of a new planet for humanity to colonize. Enjoy a fully explorable starship, filled with events to enjoy with your crewmates.

name: Yoshida Gakuen Senki
description: Sin descripción

name: Learn Chess
description: Become a chess master! Train and master the game of chess with the greatest of ease on your Nintendo DS with Learn Chess. Learn the rules, tactics and strategies of Chess through different exercises. All the game modes are accessible right from the start allowing experienced players to test their skills immediately.

name: Solfege
description: Kagura is a high school student who returns to her old school after three years abroad. There, she wants to meet again her sempai Sukune, who she admired since she was little. But she has also more friends: the active Chiho and the serene Kotomi. But it seems Sukune has forgotten her! What's happening...?

name: Seven Days: Anata to Sugosu Nanokakan
description:
One day close to the beginning of summer vacation, Shuuichi was watching a ‘cursed Blu-ray’ given to him by his buddy when a spirit came out from the disc and possessed him. His childhood friend Murasaki belonged to a family that managed an ancient temple, so she tried an exorcism to rid him of the spirit. While the ritual was successful and quelled the vindictive spirit, the spirit girl’s form remained due to her inexperience. Her name was Chiyako, the name of the girl who was killed on screen, and she revealed that the spirits of six other girls dwelled within her.

According to Murasaki, spirits can only remain in this world for 49 days, which meant that there would only be seven days allotted for each of the seven girls. Shuuichi was tasked with helping them achieve happiness so they can leave this world with no regrets. However, it is a very short time to accomplish this task. Also he did not realize at this time that it meant that he would be getting to know each girl well only to bid a painful farewell seven times over.

name: Mold 2: Origin
description:
"Mold 2: Origin

" takes place before the first game in the series... explaining the origin of the mold curse. Stan lives in an isolated location with his wife Mary. He has metal detection as a hobby. After finding a strange amulet things start to get really weird.

Is it possible to break this curse? what is the origin of all this?...

name: Night of Carnage
description:
Adam is a 13-year-old teenager who lives with his mother in a quiet neighborhood... When they get the news that there's a murderer on the loose...

Adam begins to suspect that his neighbor may be the dreaded killer.

name: S.M.S
description: After Chance's girlfriend leaves... he starts getting strange messages from her number. Forcing him to do some pretty weird things

name: R.I.P
description: Kevin is a police officer who is looking for a very dangerous killer. After receiving an anonymous call, he decides to check out the place.

name: Endless Days
description: Dylan takes a job on an isolated island looking after the lighthouse for six months. The last lighthouse keeper has mysteriously disappeared and as the days go by, Dylan discovers that he may not be alone on the island.

name: Gears
description: Adam and his friends gather for a beer in a bar... After being kidnapped by an assassin... he will have to play a dangerous and deadly game to save his life and that of his friends.

name: Race of Life
description: Race of Life is a college/street racing Adult Visual Novel. Take a peek into the underground racing scene, where suck, squeeze, bang, blow is about more than just your engine cycle. Race and upgrade your car to take control over your future. The more rubber you burn, the more money you earn.

name: Paper Mario: All Bosses in the Same Battle
description: Paper Mario romhack that adds all the bosses in the game in a single battle

name: Project B
description: Project B is a free multiplayer browser shooter that doesn't require any registration to play. It contains two game modes: deathmatch and killrace. In deathmatch, players are ranked based on their amount of kills. In killrace, the player with the least amount of kills is eliminated after every round.

name: Well...
description:
Welcome to "Well...", a very difficult first-person precision platformer with engaging lore and storyline! In this game, you'll find yourself in a mysterious magic well with a few strange rats. To climb your way out of this unfamiliar terrain, you must strafe platform to platform while relying on your intuition for navigation. Along the way, you'll discover and collect hidden journals; these will enlighten you on the well's history. Four levels must be beat in order to save this perplexing world. The levels progress in difficulty, making your journey continually more rewarding and rage-inducing.

With its intuitive controls and fun gameplay, "Well..." is the perfect game for anyone who loves a good platformer with a twist. So why not join us on this adventure and see what lies waiting at the bottom of the well?

name: Pokémon Scarlet + The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero
description:
A bundle that includes both the Pokémon Scarlet game and The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero DLC

Catch, battle, and train Pokémon in the Paldea region, a vast land filled with lakes, towering peaks, wastelands, small towns, and sprawling cities. Explore a wide-open world at your own pace and traverse land, water, and air by riding on the form-shifting Legendary Pokémon Miraidon. Choose either Sprigatito, Fuecoco, or Quaxly to be your first partner Pokémon before setting off on your journey through Paldea.

Adventure beyond the Paldea region in Pokémon Violet: The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero

Even more Pokémon, places, and stories await in this 2-part DLC for the Pokémon Violet game! In Part 1: The Teal Mask, join a special school trip to the land of Kitakami. In Part 2: The Indigo Disk, study abroad at Blueberry Academy! Encounter the newly-discovered Legendary Pokémon Ogerpon and Terapagos as you broaden your horizons beyond Uva Academy and explore even more of the Pokémon world.

name: Pokémon Violet + The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero
description:
A bundle that includes both the Pokémon Violet game and The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero DLC

Catch, battle, and train Pokémon in the Paldea region, a vast land filled with lakes, towering peaks, wastelands, small towns, and sprawling cities. Explore a wide-open world at your own pace and traverse land, water, and air by riding on the form-shifting Legendary Pokémon Miraidon. Choose either Sprigatito, Fuecoco, or Quaxly to be your first partner Pokémon before setting off on your journey through Paldea.

Adventure beyond the Paldea region in Pokémon Violet: The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero

Even more Pokémon, places, and stories await in this 2-part DLC for the Pokémon Violet game! In Part 1: The Teal Mask, join a special school trip to the land of Kitakami. In Part 2: The Indigo Disk, study abroad at Blueberry Academy! Encounter the newly-discovered Legendary Pokémon Ogerpon and Terapagos as you broaden your horizons beyond Uva Academy and explore even more of the Pokémon world.

name: Megaton Musashi
description:
Megaton Musashi is set on Earth in the year 2118. The main characters pilot giant machines called “Musashi” to combat the Dorakuta, invaders from outer space that destroyed the planet in a matter of days.

This game obtained a free2play version called "Megaton Musashi X (Cross)" with additional content

name: Lemmings
description: This port of Lemmings is graphically almost identical to the original Amiga release. However, the lack of sampling capabilities means that the FX and entire OST have been completely redone using the native soundchip.

name: Lemmings
description: While the intro cutscene is absent, the graphics in this port see a decent upgrade to resolution over the original version. This is perhaps most obvious in the lemmings themselves, which are much more detailed than before. The FX and soundtrack stay mostly unchanged, and overall this might be considered the best port of the game due to being almost identical other than the graphics upgrade. The game was released as a 3 Floppy Disk Set seperated by program, graphics, and levels + sound.

name: I Was a Soft-boy on Tiktok...
description: A little story about an interesting experience with a certain app

name: Lemmings
description: This port of Lemmings is graphically almost identical to the original Amiga release. The allowing of sample-based sounds means that it doesn't fall into the same pitfall as the PC-98 release. However, the soundtrack retains the completely different OST from the PC-98 release rescored for the improved soundchip, and even the SFX are slightly different.

name: Devilish Kisses
description: Just left-click anywhere on the screen to make the girls kiss. You have to avoid getting caught by the nosy bigoted demons in the back lol.

name: Lemmings
description: This port features the same game on the surface, but both the graphics and sounds have been redone from scratch for this console. While the result doesn't change much, the added UI elements and higher quality music do make this port feel different. Most obvious is the graphics change which sees the resolution stay the same but the textures themselves remapped to look pretty similar, but not exact. Even the intro sees redone graphics, though the content itself is almost identical to the original.

name: I Made This Game on a Shitty Chromebook
description: Thoughts and feelings, February 2023

name: Tin Knight
description: An open world adventure that allows you to explore at your own pace and uncover secrets through cryptic clues.

name: Tank Online: War Shooting Simulator
description: Enjoy the thrilling action of tank warfare in Tank Online! Experience unique tank game with stunning visuals and realistic physics. Join the fight now!

name: Windosill: Steam Deck Edition
description: Explore a series of landscapes populated by objects and creatures that come alive with your engagement.

name: The Azmodeus Project
description: A survival game in an open world of zombies.

name: Up to Clouds
description: Protect your village, don't let the monsters climb down the sky-high bean. Buy traps and upgrade them to the highest level. Wear the strongest armour and always use the right weapon to defeat the enemy.

name: Jigsaw Puzzles: Fantasy Landscapes
description: Enjoy 30 puzzles of increasing difficulty featuring original artwork of stunning fantasy landscapes!

name: Destiny 2: Legacy Collection
description: This edition includes The Witch Queen, Beyond Light, and Shadowkeep. Play through three epic campaigns, unlock 37 Exotic weapons, 15 Exotic pieces of armor, and the power of Stasis, allowing you to lock down and control the battlefield.

name: Not Anyone's Business but My Own
description: Navigate a local princess through the pages of a hand-crafted fairy tale and help her solve the mystery of a golden ring in this narrative-driven point-and-click adventure game with multiple endings.

name: Zombie Train
description:
in the not too distant future a virus-stricken world attempts to protect the last reminants of humanity from the infectious spread of a devastating zombie plague.
Nearly all modes of transportation have been shutdown.

name: 15 ﾠ
description: The 15-puzzle is a sliding puzzle that consists of a frame of numbered square tiles in random order with one tile missing. The object of the puzzle is to place the tiles in order by making sliding moves that use the empty space.

name: All Star Kart Race: Crazy Gear Championship
description: Put on your fire suit and get ready for the ride of your life! Extreme speeds, awesome thrills and spills await as you step onto the track. A brand new go kart awaits you! Can you take home the trophy?

name: Balls vs. Maze
description:
Welcome to Balls vs Maze.
Rotate 50 mazes and release 50 balls from each!
Simple controls and satisfying gameplay.
Features fun physics with twisty mazes!
Twist to escape the Maze!

name: Catchy Cheese
description:
Eat all the cheese you can before running out of moves in this clever little endless puzzler.
Discover awesome characters and unleash power-ups as you progress.

name: Bowl 'Em Down
description:
Have you ever wondered how a bowling ball feels as they roll down the lane? It's probably terrifying, so i would imagine you'd be screaming, right?
That's kinda what this game is all about.
Try to get a high score in this infinite, randomly generated bowling game.
Another twist is that when you fail a run you are prompted to scream to continue! You can do this infinitely as long as you scream louder than last time. You'll be managing your volume to get the most out of the feature and be screaming your lungs out by the end.

name: Driver Mini
description:
Are you a new learner-driver? Do you eager to enhance your driving skills? And do you like casual game or challenge yourself? If YES, I think you should like this game.
Driver Mini has a good simulation for real driving\parking, use driving steering and pedal to control you car, like real world the acceleration and deceleration are simulated too, notice that any jerk can smash your car, so be careful.

name: Fancy Cakes: Merge Adventure
description:
Bake gorgeous cupcakes, delicious cookies, mouth-watering muffins, scrumptious pies, yummy pastries and plenty more! Float your way through amazing towns and immerse yourself in this innovative, addictive puzzle adventure that’s hours of fun for everyone!
Merge and swipe your way through hundreds of fun levels and delightfully charming towns. Discover new tasty recipes and combine dozens of layers of heavenly desserts. Create the most fabulous cakes and share them with friends!
Explore the pastry paradise in this addictive and challenging puzzle adventure! It’s hours of delicious fun!

name: Gobble It
description: Gobble equal quantities of good and rotten food for a high score! Gobbling spoilt food does not reduce your score!

name: Get! Monster
description:
After summon war, Monsters have no masters, It is a problem to rebuild kingdom. So king recruit heroes for destroy monsters.
Hire and upgrade your heroes, then fight and destroy monsters.

name: Lamp and Vamp
description:
Lamp and Vamp is a roguelike game where you play as a Vampire seeking the castle of his dreams.
Your Vampire is alone against the world! You will need to master the dark arts to find your way to the tomb in each level, where you will acquire new powers.

name: Octopi: Snow Globe
description:
This is the first version of the Octopi games on the iPad, featuring better than ever game play.
With an interactive tutorial and beautiful graphics, it is the perfect introduction to this series of action games for your brain.

name: Parabox
description: Parabox is an award-winning puzzle game that explores a unique recursive system of boxes within boxes within boxes within boxes. Learn to manipulate the world's structure by pushing boxes into and out of each other. Wrap your head around what happens when a box contains itself, and learn to use infinity to your advantage.

name: Sushi Drop
description:
Merge the same sushi blocks to make great sushi!
Can you merge the sushi ordered by the customer and clear the stage?
How expensive & luxury sushi can you make? Try it right now!
Sushi Drop : Merge Puzzle is a simple, classic puzzle game that can be enjoyed by everyone in the family!

name: Squares & Fruit
description: Squares & Fruit comes in two playing modes. While both modes reward the efficient player, to get a high score, each demands a different strategy. For instance, Classic mode players should conserve moves for the next round; Challenge mode players should match the edges to get higher scores.

name: Frisky Tom
description: Game Boy port of Frisky Tom.

name: Tiles Town
description: Explore a town made out of Domino tiles and talk to its inhabitants.

name: Astra and The New Constellation
description:
Astra is the smallest star in Constellation Station. Tired of being picked on, she sets off an adventure to build a new constellation of her own!

Run, jump, slide, and float across the galaxy while collecting stardust to build your new home in this retro-inspired Pico-8 platformer.

name: Pac-Attack
description: Game Boy port of Pac-Attack.

name: I Want to Be a Girl and I Don't Know Why That's so Hard
description:
an interactive diary entry

just felt like being a bit more creative with my ramblings this time around.

hope you all enjoy?

name: Pac-Attack
description: A remake of Pac-Attack released first in Namco Anthology 2.

name: The Goblin is Out
description: Continuing my tradition (??) of making a deranged kink Bitsy at Christmas time for the Bitsy Jam but then not actually submitting it to the jam. This time it has basically nothing to do with the jam theme.

name: Crime Life Crime Wave
description: some thoughts about an old video game and game maker and playing games as a young child

name: Batman: Gotham by Gaslight
description: A Batman: Gotham by Gaslight game could've taken fans to the cobblestone streets of 19th-century Gotham, but the project never saw the light of day. A Batman: Gotham by Gaslight game nearly followed the release of 2008's Batman: Arkham Asylum, but the project was sadly canceled before it could see the light of day.

name: Climber
description: This is a little adventure in the depths of a mysterious cave. Try on the role of a rescuer and try to save the lives of a team of missing cavers as quickly as possible. You will need concentration, discipline and strong hands, because the owners of these depths do not like uninvited guests.

name: The Whisperer
description: Join Suzie on her journey to rescue her cute little friends.

name: Leta Adventure
description: Through Spring, Autumn, Winter and Summer! Leta Adventure is a relaxing role-playing game where you must travel a journey in order to deliver a letter. Featuring many different locations, minigames and characters to meet... your Adventure awaits!

name: Lattice Dancer
description: Experience the thrill of dodging lasers in this easy-to-learn, casual game. Your goal is simple. Dodge the lattice laser. Sharpen your spatial awareness and concentration skills with each round. Are you ready to dance with danger?

name: YinYang Street
description: Set in a small town on the border in the 1980s, "Street" is led by Li Minglai, an active soldier engaged in a homeland defense war. A trip back home in the usual but, Once warm and happy home is now only a mystery, everything points to a mysterious and weird legend - "Yin and Yang street".

name: Crossroad of Worlds: Mirrors to Other Worlds - Collector's Edition
description: Detective, adventure awaits! Once again amazing worlds full of puzzles and riddles await you. Test your deduction, solve cases and help people all over the multiverse!

name: Private Crusade
description: Make the battlefield your weapon to vanquish monstrous foes in turn-based, tactical combat. Explore the mysterious Drowned Lands in a tale of heroic fantasy inspired by the arcade classics of old.

name: EvilUp
description: EvilUp is an adventure for roguelike and RPG fans! Fight with the bloodthirsty monsters, explore the dark corners of the labyrinths, and improve your skills and character development. Offering challenging quests, various equipment, numerous types of enemies and random generation of levels will make your every attempt unique.

name: Rider Among Dead
description: Rider Among Dead - Mad Zombie Killer Machine Survival is the number one action game that blends the mechanics of off-road racing and survival games. The world has been consumed by a zombie outbreak, leaving you to survive in the wasteland.

name: Untold Love Stories
description: Untold Love Stories is a collection of visual novels in different genres and styles. Romance, meetings, dangers, adventures and even mystery are waiting for you!

name: Dead Inside
description: A thrilling, first-person, action-survival game set in the modern post-apocalypse. As mankind’s last hope, you’ll traverse the hospital ravaged by a lethal plague. the fight for survival gets progressively more difficult as the story unfolds. Be ready for violence.

name: Furry Shakespeare: Dashing Dinosaurs & Sexy Centaurs
description: Sin descripción

name: I Was the Cat
description:
You ever have a bad day?
Well... Today you have.

Work sucks. Your partner sucks.
And you think... maybe... life isn't worth it.

Until an angel bumps into you.

And, just like that, you have a whole new purpose in life.

Follow our unlikely heroine, as she navigates her newfound zeal for life and pursues the woman of her dreams.

name: Dude Quest
description: Dude Quest is a satirical monster catcher RPG heavily inspired by Pokémon, released back in 2014 as a flash game. Features 59 Dudes to collect and use on your journey.

name: Drawn to Life: The Next Chapter
description: Drawn to Life: The Next Chapter is a platform game developed by Planet Moon Studios and published by THQ for the Wii. Despite having the same title, it has a different plot compared to the DS version.

name: Crymachina
description: Crymachina is an action RPG where mechanical girls strive to survive in a post-apocalyptic world to become “Real Humans''. But what does it mean to be a “Real Human”?
